anya-e0806n2:2_1: atettha vutyanukūlāya pañcikāya vā bhavitabbaṁ, pañcikānu kūlāya vuttiyā vā, na cettha
anya-e0806n2:2_2: dvinnamaññoññānukūlatā dissati, tathāhi vuttiyaṁ-‘ekānekatthesu vattamānato nāmasmā’ti
anya-e0806n2:2_3: ettakameva pakativisesanavasena vuttaṁ, pañcikāyantu tabbisesana vasena ca paccayatthavisesanavasena
anya-e0806n2:2_4: ca attho dassito, tadeva mubhinnannāññamaññānukūlatā dissati, tato ettha yathā dvinnamaññoññānukūlatā
anya-e0806n2:2_5: sampajjati, tathā byācikkhissāma “yadi panettha vutyānukūlā pañcikā bhaveyya paccayatthapakkho
anya-e0806n2:2_6: jahitabbo siyāti ‘te…pe… ekānekatthesu’ti ca, tena…pe… yojaniya’nti ca etesaṁ jahitabbatāya
anya-e0806n2:2_7: bahupāṭhavilopo āpajjati, yadi pana pañcikānukūlā vutti bhaveyya vuttiyaṁ kiñcimattaṁ
anya-e0806n2:2_8: pakkhipitabba mattameva siyāti bahuvilopāpatti (na) hotīti etesaṁ dvedve honti ekāne
anya-e0806n2:2_9: katthesu vattamānato nāmasmā’ti vuttiyā bhavitabba”nti, evañhi sati satthantarenāpi
anya-e0806n2:2_10: saha ghaṭate, sutte ‘dvedvekānekesu nāmasmā’ti vuttattā ‘ekānekesū’ti idaṁ paccayavisesanaṁ vā yujjati
anya-e0806n2:3_0: Pakativisesanavasena vā yadetaṁ paccayavisesanaṁ, tadā sāmatthiyā ekānekesūti pakativisesanampi
anya-e0806n2:3_1: labbhati, tattha sāmatthiyamattha balaṁ, tathāhyekādīsu bhavantā pakativāccānamevekattādiabyati
anya-e0806n2:3_2: rittaatthamattādīrūpānaṁ jotakā syādayo kathamekattādīsu vattamānato nāmasmā aññato
anya-e0806n2:3_3: siyunti yathāvuttanāmavisesākkhepo, tathā itthiṇādippaccayādīnampi pana pakativisesānupādānepi
anya-e0806n2:3_4: yato dhātvādi vāccottho natthi, sāmatthiyā tato, dhātutyādyantehi tyādyanta vāccehi
anya-e0806n2:3_5: (potthake) na honte vittipaccayā, tathā ṇādipaccayāpi… vibhatyantā vidhānato, yadetampakativisesanaṁ
anya-e0806n2:3_6: tadāpi sāmatthiyeneva ekattādīsu vattamānato nāmasmā tajjotanāya bhavantā syādayo
anya-e0806n2:3_7: kathamaññattha honti asambhavāti ekānekesu dvedveti labbhati, athavā sarūpena avuttampi
anya-e0806n2:3_8: sāmatthiyenekānekatthesūti gammamānaṁ vuttameva hotīti katvā‘tecā’tiādikaṁ vuttanti
anya-e0806n2:3_9: gahetabbaṁ, ekānekesu vattamānato nāmasmāti kimatthaṁ asatvabhūtāya kiriyāyekattādisambandhābhāvā
anya-e0806n2:3_10: kriyatthāca tyādīhi yevekattādīnaṁ vuttattā tyādyantehi ca na bhaveyyunti payojanantaramāha-‘yampanā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:3_11: pañcakanāmatthassādhippetabhāvo cettha pakkhassetasseva yuttattā. Tathāhi saṅkhyākammādayo
anya-e0806n2:3_12: nāma vāccassa dabbassa dhammo sakattho-pasajjano ca saddo dabbeyeva vattate… dabbeyevānyanayādivohārā,
anya-e0806n2:3_13: tattha dabbavācinā saddena dabbadhammānamabbhantarīkaraṇanti nāyuttametaṁ nāmena
anya-e0806n2:3_14: pañcannamabhidhānaṁ, vibhattiyo pana jotikā, itthipaccayā ca itthiliṅgassa, tathā
anya-e0806n2:5: Samavetaṁ vade liṅgaṁ, saṅkhyaṁ kammādikammi ceti.
anya-e0806n2:6_0: Ekānekesu syādīnaṁ yathākkamaṁ dassetuṁ ‘tenā’tiādi vuttaṁ, tenāti yena pañcako nāmattho
anya-e0806n2:6_1: adhippeto ekādīsu ca atthesu jo-tanīyesu syādayo vidhiyissanti tena, sabbatthāti
anya-e0806n2:6_3: honti tathāpi ekādayo saṅkhyāya paricchinne atthe vattanti na saṅkhyāmatte, saṅkhyāya
anya-e0806n2:6_4: sambhavābhāvā saṅkhyeye bhavatīti na saṅkhyāpi syādīnamattho”ti (na) kevalaṁ sakattha
anya-e0806n2:6_5: dabbādiyeva syādīnamattho na bhavati, api tu saṅkhyāpītyapisaddattho, anena saṅkhyā
anya-e0806n2:6_6: vibhatyattho catukko nāmatthotyayampakkho nirākato pañcako nāmatthoti dassane saṅkhyākammādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n2:6_7: vibhattiyo jotikā honti, tiko nāmatthoti dassane tu saṅkhyākammādayo vibhattivāccā
anya-e0806n2:6_8: honti, idāni adhippetapañcakanāmatthe sakatthādikaṁ sarūpato dassetuṁ ‘tatthā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n2:6_9: tattha sakattho visesananti sarūpādi yaṁ kiñci visesanattena vattumicchitaṁ taṁ sakattho
anya-e0806n2:10: Bhāvābhāvasabhāvo yo, so guṇo nigguṇo mato.
anya-e0806n2:13_0: Idāni sarūpādino visesanassa sakatthabhāvaṁ jātyādivisesassa dabbabhāvañca dassetuṁ
anya-e0806n2:13_2: ettha pana goti jātimattavācini gosadde payutte gosaddo jātimattamāheti so jātiṁ
anya-e0806n2:13_3: viseseti nāma. Yaṭṭhiādisaddehi yaṭṭhiādisahacaritā upacārato gahitāti yaṭṭhiādidabbehi
anya-e0806n2:13_4: yaṭṭhiādisahacaritā purisā visesīyantīti āha-‘dabbampi dabbantarassa visesanabhūtambhavatī’ti,
anya-e0806n2:13_5: yaṭṭhiyopavesayāti yaṭṭhisaddavacanīya yaṭṭhidabbavisiṭṭhe purise pavesayāti attho,
anya-e0806n2:13_6: kuntepavesayāti etthāpi esevanayo, yathāvuttacatubbidhasakatthato paropi atthi sakatthoti
anya-e0806n2:13_7: āha-‘katthacī’tiādi, sambandhanimittoti sambandho nimittaṁ kāraṇaṁ paccayappavattiyā
anya-e0806n2:13_8: assa paccayassa soti samāso, ettha hi daṇḍo assa atthīti assāti sāmino purisassa
anya-e0806n2:13_9: saṁsaṅkhātadaṇḍādidabbena sahayo sassāmisambandho, sopi paccayassa nimittaṁ, tathā
anya-e0806n2:13_10: ca vakkhati-‘daṇḍapurisasambandhā daṇḍīti paccayo’ti, (kiri)yā padatthassāpi visesanattena
anya-e0806n2:13_11: sakatthabhāvo jātipadatthādīnaṁ vutta ṭhāneyeva vattabboti pācakoti ettha kiriyākārakasambandhasaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0806n2:13_12: parābhimataṁ sakatthampi paropadesenopadisitukāmo idha sambandhasakatthassa vuttaṭṭhāneyeva
anya-e0806n2:13_14: pañcamaṁ nāmasaṅkhātamatthaṁ dabbapadatthena saṅgahetvā jātiguṇakiriyādabbānīti hi
anya-e0806n2:13_15: catubbidho nāmattho, nāmampi anvattharuḷhivasena duvidhaṁ pumitthinapuṁsaka liṅgavasena
anya-e0806n2:13_16: tividhampi catubbidhaṁ hoti… yathāvutte catubbidhe atthe namati, te vā attani nāmetīti
anya-e0806n2:13_17: iminā kāraṇena. sāmaññaguṇa kiriyāyadicchāvasenāññathāpi catubbidhattaṁ nāmassa vadanti,
anya-e0806n2:13_18: tatthāpi yadicchānāmassa dabbanāmeneva saṅgaho veditabbo, itthattaṁ esāti pasiddhimā
anya-e0806n2:13_19: attho, yampanātiādinā vuttamevatthaṁ sādheti ‘tatthe’ccādinā, abhidhāyakattena jotakattena,
anya-e0806n2:13_20: ikārantatoti munisaddato, aññathāti ikārantato na bhavati ce, atoti ādesa bhavanato
anya-e0806n2:13_21: phalaṁ dassitaṁ na siyāti sambandho, vuttiyaṁ ‘evaṁ kumārī kumāriyo’tiādīsu evanti
anya-e0806n2:13_22: yathā pulliṅge ikārantato syādīnamudāharaṇamanādesatthaṁ vuttaṁ evamitthiyampi anākārantatoti
anya-e0806n2:13_23: dasseti, upalakkhaṇaṁ cetaminī-nī-ū-ti-paccayantādīnaṁ, asati…pe… vacaneti iminā
anya-e0806n2:13_25: (1-4-104) iti hi tesaṁ suttaṁ, tassattho ‘syādīnaṁ tyādīnañca vibhattisaññā hotī’ti,
anya-e0806n2:13_26: bhavantīti anvatthavasena vibhattisaddavacanīyāni bhavanti, so (yevattho) vibhatticcanena
anya-e0806n2:13_27: vibhajīyatīti vibhatti, kamme ktippaccayantoyaṁ vibhatti saddoti dasseti, kathampanetesu
anya-e0806n2:13_28: syādīsu vibhajīyaticcassa vākyatthāssānugamo yenevaṁ vuccaticcāsaṅkiya yena yathā
anya-e0806n2:15_0: Vuttiyaṁ kattukiriyāyāti kattusādyatāya taṁ sambandhiniyā kattukammaṭṭhāyapi duvidhāya
anya-e0806n2:15_1: kiriyāya, anekatthattā dhātūnaṁ karoti ettha sambandhanatthoti āha-‘karīyati abhisambandhīyatī’ti,
anya-e0806n2:15_2: yaṁkiñci padattharūpaṁ sambajjhatīti attho, iminā cānvatthavasenevāyaṁ kammavohāro
anya-e0806n2:15_3: siddhoti dasseti, sabbakārakānampi pana kiriyāsambandha sabbhāvepi kiriyābhisambandhīyamānatteneva
anya-e0806n2:15_4: yaṁ vattumicchitaṁ tadeva kammaṁ viññeyyaṁ, kattādi kattu kiriyāyābhisambandhīyamānattepi
anya-e0806n2:15_5: kattādittavacanicchāyeva kammaṁ na hoti… yasmā vacanicchāyeva kārakāni bhavanti,
anya-e0806n2:15_6: evaṁ sabbakārakānampi kārakantarappattiyaṁ tadabhāvo yathāyogaṁ vattabbo, vākyekadesenetyanena
anya-e0806n2:15_7: “dvedvekā”dino vākyassa “kamme dutiyā”iccādino ca ekavākyattaṁ sūceti, pakaraṇassa
anya-e0806n2:15_8: mahāvākyarūpattā vippakaṭṭhānipi vākyāni ākaṅkhādisabhāve aññamaññasambandhānubhavanenekavākyabhāvampaṭīpajjante, vuttī hi–
anya-e0806n2:18_1: tyādinopi dvinnaṁ pūraṇiyā dutiyāti sakkā voharituṁ, tathāpi syādīnaṁ dukeyeva dutiyātatiyā
anya-e0806n2:18_2: ruḷhīti natyādīnaṁ dukāni dutiyādisaddena gayhanti, visiṭṭhesūti kammādinā visesitesu,
anya-e0806n2:18_3: tividhaṁ kammanti sakasamayappasiddhiyā kammassa tividhattamāha, aññe tu sattavidhamicchanti, kathaṁ–
anya-e0806n2:23: Tattha icchitādīni upariyevāpi bhavissanti, tatreccādinā tividhaṁ kammaṁ sarūpato dasseti, tattha nibbattikammameke-nekadhā parikappenti, tadiha pakāsayissāma–
anya-e0806n2:24: Satī-satī vā pakati, na yattha pariṇāminī,
anya-e0806n2:26: Asantaṁ jāyate yaṁ vā, yaṁ santamappakāsati,
anya-e0806n2:28_0: Ayamettha attho “kaṭavikārassa kāsasaṅkhātā vijjamānā pakati pariṇāminī kaṭavikārampati
anya-e0806n2:28_1: pariṇamantī yatthappayoge na nissīyate… kaṭaṁ karotītettha kevalamatthāvagamamattassa
anya-e0806n2:28_2: vattumicchitattā kāseti asuyyamānattā ca, pakatiyā tu suyya mānatte vikāriyaṁ siyā,
anya-e0806n2:28_3: teneva kāse kaṭaṁ karoti, taṇḍule odanaṁ pacatīti dvayattho karoti pacati ca, tasmā
anya-e0806n2:28_4: kāse karoti taṇḍule pacatīti vikārīyati, kaṭaṁ karoti odanampacatīti nibbattī yatīti
anya-e0806n2:28_5: attho, asatī vā pakati avijjamānattāyeva yattha na nissīyate… (yathā) (potthake)
anya-e0806n2:28_6: ( ) saṁyogaṁ janayati vibhāgamuppādayatīti saṁyogavibhāgānaṁ kassāpi pakatiyā avikārattā
anya-e0806n2:28_8: avijjamāna (pakati) kaṁ vā kāriyaṁ nibbattikammaṁ nāmāti eko, aññesamaññathāti vatvā
anya-e0806n2:28_9: tandasseti ‘asanta’miccādinā, yaṁ asantamavijjamānaṁ jāyate, tannibbattikammaṁ, yathā
anya-e0806n2:28_10: sukhaṁ janayati buddhimuppādayatīti, santaṁ vijjamānameva vā kevalamappakāsitapubbaṁ
anya-e0806n2:28_11: yaṁ uppattiyā abhibyattiyā vā pakāsati, tampi nibbattikammaṁ, yathā puttaṁ vijāyatisāmaññamabhibyañjayatī”ti,
anya-e0806n2:28_12: tadevaṁ kesañci matena anissitapakatikaṁ avijjamānapakatikanti duvidhaṁ nibbattikammampi
anya-e0806n2:28_13: aññesammatena asantaṁ jāyamānaṁ santamappakāsamānanti duvidhaṁ nibbattikammampītisabbampi
anya-e0806n2:28_14: aṭṭhitapubbameva jāyatītyasato jānanā na byatiriccaticcāha-‘asato jananaṁ karīyatī’ti,
anya-e0806n2:31_0: Kiñci vikāriyaṁ kammaṁ pakatiyā kāraṇassa ucchedena sambhūtaṁ, yathā kaṭṭhaṁ bhasmaṁ
anya-e0806n2:31_1: karotīti kaṭṭhassāccantaparāvatti parāvattiyā (potthake), kiñci pana guṇantarānamuppattiyā,
anya-e0806n2:31_2: yathā suvaṇṇaṁ kaṭakaṁ keyuraṁ vā karotīti evaṁ dvīdhā sā vikati hotīti attho, na
anya-e0806n2:31_3: vibhāvīyanteti na gamyante, sā patti‘pāpīyati visayīkarīyatī’ti katvā.
anya-e0806n2:33: Dassanā vānumānā vā, sā pattīti pakittitā.
anya-e0806n2:34_0: Yattha kiriyākato kiriyāsampādito viseso atisayo koci nāvagamyate nappatīyate dassanā
anya-e0806n2:34_1: vā paccakkhappamāṇena anumānappamāṇena vā yathā nibbattivikatīnamatisayo paccakkhānumānā
anya-e0806n2:34_2: vagamanīyo, tatra hi nibbattiyaṁ visesasiddhiratipasiddhā… atthalābhākhyassa visesassāvijjamānassa
anya-e0806n2:34_3: kiriyākattā, vikāriye ( ) (eva) (potthake) tu kvaci paccakkhavisayo… kaṭṭhaṁ ḍahatīti
anya-e0806n2:34_5: pasādayati veti visiṭṭhamukhavaṇṇādikāriyānumeyyattā rosādino, evaṁ yattha na visesasiddhi
anya-e0806n2:34_6: api tu pattimattaṁ, sā pattīti pakittitā kathitā, ādiccampassati dhammamajjhetīti
anya-e0806n2:34_7: ayamettha attho, kathañcarahi asantassa santassa (potthake) pattikammassa kiñci (akaronta)ssa
anya-e0806n2:34_8: kārakattaṁ, na hi kiñci akarontaṁ kārakambhavitumarahatīti uccate-
anya-e0806n2:37_0: Atra daṭṭhuṁ sakkā iti dassane khamatā ābhāsopagamo visayattopagamo visayattopagamanaṁ
anya-e0806n2:37_1: byatti ceti evamādayo visesā yathāyogaṁ pattikammassa kiriyānipphattiyaṁ icchitā,
anya-e0806n2:37_2: tato tassa kārakattanti attho, ādiccaṁ passatīti ettha hi ādicco daṭṭhuṁ sakkā, tatova
anya-e0806n2:37_4: tathā ññatrāpyādisaddagahitavisesavasena kiriyāsiddhito kārakattaṁ veditabbaṁ, nanu
anya-e0806n2:37_5: vikāriyampi nibbattikammameva… tena rūpenāsatoyeva jananato, pattikammampi kiriyāsambandharūpenāsantameva
anya-e0806n2:39: Tatra yampetaṁ ghaṭate, yathā patīti saddatthāvattānato.
anya-e0806n2:40_0: Visesānupādānatoti “kamme dutiyā”ti sāmaññena vuttattā vuttaṁ. Karīyati kaṭo, kato
anya-e0806n2:40_1: kaṭo ccevamādīsu tyādippabhutīhi atihitakammādinissayesupi ekattādīsu dutiyādayo
anya-e0806n2:40_2: papponti niyamābhāvā, tathāhi pañcake nāmatthe kaṭādivacanīyassa sambandhī kammādyattho,
anya-e0806n2:40_3: tyādippabhutīti anabhi hitassa saṅkhyākhyassāparassa vibhatyatthassābhidhānāya abhihitesupi
anya-e0806n2:40_4: kaṭādīsu kammādīsu dutiyādayo siyunti pāṇiniyā “kamme dutiyā”ccādīsu (2-3-2) “anabhihite”ti
anya-e0806n2:40_6: jotanāyābhihitesu dutiyādayo siyuṁ, tike pana saṅkhyākammādayo vibhatti vacanīyā,
anya-e0806n2:40_7: tattha yajjapi kammādino paccayenābhidhānaṁ, tathāpyekattādayo nābhihitāti tassa
anya-e0806n2:40_8: saṅkhyākhyassāparassa vibhatyatthassāti dhānāya abhihitesupi kammādīsu dutiyādayo
anya-e0806n2:40_10: āha-‘tatridaṁ siyā’tiādi, tatra tasmiṁ dutiyādi vibhattividhāne idaṁ codyaṁ siyā,
anya-e0806n2:40_11: kinti āha-‘pañcake’iccādi, anabhihitakammādinissayesuti anabhihitā kammādayo nissayā
anya-e0806n2:40_12: yesamekattādīnaṁ, tesūtyattho, dutiyādayo vibhattiyo yathā siyunti jotanāyābhidhānāya
anya-e0806n2:40_13: cāti yujjamānavasena attho veditabbo, abhihitakammādinissayesupīti apisaddena anabhihitakammādinissayamekattādiṁ
anya-e0806n2:40_14: samuccinoti, āsaṅkiyāti pubbakiriyāya vuttanti aparakiriyā veditabbā, pañcake tike
anya-e0806n2:40_15: cā bhihitakammādinissaye sekattādīsu dutiyādippattimāsaṅkāvasena dassetvā catukkavādīnampi
anya-e0806n2:40_17: pāṭipadikattho tappaṭipajjane kammādayo vibhattivacanīyā, tadā ‘anabhihite kamme’tiādinā
anya-e0806n2:40_19: yadā panāyaṁ pakkho ‘saṅkhyā vibhattivacanīyā’ti tadā “kamme dutiyā” tyevamādayo
anya-e0806n2:40_20: niddesā visayasandassanamattāyeva veditabbā”ti, sabbathāti pañcakatikavādīnaṁ catukkavādīnañca
anya-e0806n2:40_22: napuṁsake bhāve kto, na vijjate byatirittaṁ byatireko bhedo yassa taṁ abyatirittaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:40_23: abyatibhinnanti attho, saddatthato sakatthato abyatirittaṁ atthamattaṁ atthasāmaññaṁ
anya-e0806n2:41_0: Kiñcāpi vuttiyaṁ tabbādiṇādisamāsehi abhihitamavuttaṁ, tathāpi tehi abhihitepyevameva
anya-e0806n2:41_1: daṭṭhabbanti nidassento āha-‘eva’miccādi, kara-karaṇe karīyitthāti kato‘kto bhāvakammesu’ti
anya-e0806n2:41_2: (5-56) kamme kto, satikoti ettha kītoti kammatthe “dissantaññepi paccayā”ti (4-120)
anya-e0806n2:41_3: iko, kammatāgamyate kitappaccayādīnaṁ kamme vihitattā, evañca dhuhi kimekamudāharaṇaṁ
anya-e0806n2:41_4: dattamācariyene tyato āha- ‘udāharaṇa’iccādi, anabhihiteti vacanaṁ vināpīti vacanaṁ
anya-e0806n2:41_5: vinā evāti avadhāraṇe-apisaddo, sambhāvanevā, yadyabhihitehi vacanaṁ vināpi dutiyādīnamappavatti
anya-e0806n2:41_6: bhaveyya, vacanasabbhāve tu kathāyeva natthīti attho, evañca panettha dutiyādīnamabhihite
anya-e0806n2:41_7: pasaṅgābhāvo jānitabbo “paccate odano, kato kaṭoccādopi yadi dutiyādayo siyuṁ paṭhamāvidhānassāvakāso
anya-e0806n2:41_8: na bhaveyya tato sāmatthiyānabhihiteyeva kammādo dutiyādayo sakiriyā (yaṁ tada)bhibyattiyā
anya-e0806n2:41_9: bhavissanti, paṭhamevatvabhihite”ti, na nuca paṭhamāyākārakamavakāso rukkho pilakkhoti
anya-e0806n2:41_10: rukkho pilakkhoti kriyāpadaṁ na sūyateti vibhatyantarassappatti maññatebhassāpadīpa
anya-e0806n2:41_11: kimidamuccate akārakanti yadya kārakaṁ nedampayogamarahati tato yattha visesakiriyāna
anya-e0806n2:41_12: massavanaṁ tattha padatthasahacaritāya sattāya patītiyā ‘rukkho atthi pilakkho atthī’ti
anya-e0806n2:41_13: apekkhīyatīti kārakattaṁ rukkhādīna mattheveti attheveti ññataṁ vatthuṁ paraṁ patipādayituṁ
anya-e0806n2:41_14: saddo payujjate ññaṇañca satoiti yatra kriyāpadantarassa appayogo tatra ussaggato
anya-e0806n2:41_15: sattā patītitutthīti kriyāpadānusaṅgara kattari tatiyappasaṅgaranavakāsā paṭhamā
anya-e0806n2:41_16: tyattho-bhassapadīpa, na ca uccaṁ nīcaṁtyadhikaraṇavācitte vācikā nipātassa atthītyanena
anya-e0806n2:41_17: natthi sambandhoti uccamatthītyādheyyasseva kattuttaṁ nādhārassātya kārakattamādhārassātyavakāso-tthi
anya-e0806n2:41_18: paṭhamāyāti “paṭhamāvidhā nassāvakāso na bhaveyyā”ti yathāvutto-yaṁ hetu asiddhoti
anya-e0806n2:41_19: ca sakkā vattuṁ, asaṅkhyato paṭhamātyavatvā “paṭhamāttha matte”ti (2.39) sāmaññavidhānato
anya-e0806n2:42_0: Yañcāti casaddo vattabbantarasamuccaye aparampi kiñci vattabbamatthīti attho, yañca
anya-e0806n2:42_1: phalaṁ maññateti sambandho, yadetthāna bhihitādhikāro natthi tadā yathā ‘kato kaṭo’ccatrattena
anya-e0806n2:42_2: kammassābhihitattā dutiyā na hoti tathā ‘kaṭaṁ karoti vipulaṁ dassanīya’nti kaṭasaddato
anya-e0806n2:42_3: uppannāya dutiyāya (vipulādigatassa) kammassā bhihitattā vipulādīhi visesanehi dutiyā
anya-e0806n2:42_4: na siyā, tato tyādi tabbādiṇādisamāsehi kammassāna bhihitattamattevāti vipulādīhipi
anya-e0806n2:42_5: dutiyāvidhānasaṅkhātaṁ anabhihite”ti (2-3-1) anabhihita vacanassa adhikāre yañca
anya-e0806n2:42_6: phalaṁ cintayatīti attho, yuttassātimassa attho sambandhassāti, paccekaṁ karotyabhisambandhatāyāti
anya-e0806n2:42_7: ‘kaṭaṁ karoti vipulaṁ karoti dassanīyaṁ karoti’ccevaṁ paccekaṁ paccekaṁ karotissābhisambandhatāyāti
anya-e0806n2:42_8: attho, kammatā atthīti seso, evaṁ maññate-“kaṭaṁ karomīti pavatto vipulaṁ karomī
anya-e0806n2:42_9: dassaniyaṁ karomīti ca pavattovāti vipulādīnampi paccekaṁ kammatā attheva, tatthekassābhidhāne
anya-e0806n2:42_10: parekassa sukhamavalokayantīti tadabhidhānāyapi dutiyā bhavissatī”ti, pakārantarāvatāro
anya-e0806n2:42_11: nācariye noparodhitoti tampi panettha dassayissāma-“kaṭasaddā uppajjamānā dutiyā
anya-e0806n2:42_12: kaṭajāti kammamabhihitavatī, na vipulādiguṇakammaṁ, tato tadabhidhānāya ca dutiyāyeva
anya-e0806n2:42_13: bhavati, athavā kaṭova kammaṁ, taṁ sāmānādhikaraṇyena vipulādīhipi dutiyā bhavissati,
anya-e0806n2:42_14: kaṭaṁ karoti vipulo dassanīyoti hi vuccamāne vipulādayo kattusamānādhikaraṇatāyeva
anya-e0806n2:42_15: patīyeyyuṁ tasmā kaṭasaddasāmānādhikaraṇyampaṭipādayatā vassamettha dutiyā karaṇīyā”ti.
anya-e0806n2:42_16: Nanvemiccādicodyaṁ, evanti evaṁ guṇayuttassa kammatāya sati, pappotīti kaṭa kamme-bhidhāniye
anya-e0806n2:42_17: (kato) ti ktappaccayassa katattā udārādito karotyabhisambandhā dutiyā pappotīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:42_18: evaṁ maññateccādi parihāro, avayavena kammaṁ na vadatīti sambandho, avayavenāti visuṁvisuṁ,
anya-e0806n2:42_19: kiñcarahīti āha-‘sabhāvato sabbaṁ kammaṁ vadatī’ti. Hotu kāmaṁ udārāditopi vuttena
anya-e0806n2:42_20: vidhinā paṭhamā, katasaddato kā pavattatīti āha-‘katasaddato pi’ccādi, antobhūto
anya-e0806n2:42_21: antogadho nāmassa saddassa attho yasmiṁ kammalakkhaṇattheso attho kammalakkhaṇo abhihito
anya-e0806n2:42_22: kathito sampanno sampajjatīti attho, nanu ‘kato kaṭo’ccādo sabhāvato sabbakammavuttiyā
anya-e0806n2:42_23: antobhūtanāmatthavuttiyā cātthamatte hoti sabbattha paṭhamāti ‘kaṭaṁ karoti uḷāraṁ
anya-e0806n2:42_24: sobhanaṁ dassanīya’nti kaṭāditopi uppannāya dutiyāya kammassābhihitattā uḷārādīhi
anya-e0806n2:42_25: paṭhamāppasaṅgo siyāti abhihitābhidhānappasaṅgopagataṁ codanaṁ manasi nidhāyāha-‘kaṭādisaddo
anya-e0806n2:43_1: icchitatame kammasaññaṁ vidhāya nibbatyādikesutīsu kammesu dutiyā vidhīyate pāṇinīyehi,
anya-e0806n2:43_2: icchitatamattañca tadatthattā kiriyāya, odanaṁ pacati gāvumpayo dohatityādo(hi) odanādyatthā
anya-e0806n2:43_4: vibhattiṁ vidhāya dutiyābhimatāti sambandho, puna payādinipphattinimittaṁ yaṁkiñci
anya-e0806n2:43_5: dohanādikiriyā yuttaṁ karaṇādirūpena akathitaṁ gavādikamicchitaṁ kārakaṁ, tatthāpi
anya-e0806n2:43_6: “akathitañcā”ti (1-4-51) kammasaññaṁ vidhāya teneva dutiyā vidhīyate, tadupadassetumāha-‘upayujjamāne’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:46_1: gavādi, apubbavidhimhi apādānādhikaraṇādi pubbasaññā vidhānābhāve, vidhāne hi māṇavakā
anya-e0806n2:46_2: maggaṁ pucchati, rukkhā phalānyavacinātyādi yathārahaṁ bhavati, guṇāsattanti guṇena
anya-e0806n2:46_3: sattaṁ sambandhī, guṇasaddenettha padhānasādhanaṁ dhammādikaṁ vattumicchitaṁ padhānasādhanañhi
anya-e0806n2:46_4: kiriyāyopakārakamupakāriyaṁ padhānabhūtaṁ kiriyamapekkhiya guṇo bhavati, co-nuttasamuccaye,
anya-e0806n2:46_5: padhānantu dhammādino pavattiyā tadatthattā, upayujjamānañca taṁ payopabhuticeti
anya-e0806n2:46_6: visesanasamāsaṁ katvā upayujjamānapayoppabhutino nimittanti chaṭṭhīsamāso, pabhuti
anya-e0806n2:46_7: saddena gavādino gahaṇaṁ, ādisaddena gomantādino, dutiyenādi saddena adhikaraṇādino,
anya-e0806n2:46_8: catutthena vinayādino, vidhānanti dutiyā vidhānaṁ, dutiyāvidhānamabhimatanti yojanīyaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:46_10: dutiyā” (2-3-2) tyaneneva dutiyā vidhīyate, tandassetumāha-‘yene’ccādi, “tathā yuttañcānicchita”ntīmassa
anya-e0806n2:49_2: kamma saññā siddhāti tattha “kamme dutiyā”ti dutiyā vidhīyate, tandasseti’nevicchitanānicchitasmā’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:49_3: rukkhamūlaṁ nevicchitaṁ pubbamanabhimatattā, nāpyanicchitaṁ appaṭikūlattā, gāmagamena
anya-e0806n2:49_4: hyassa tapparatā, rukkhamūlopasappanantu pasaṅgāgatanti rukkhamūlānampi kiriyābhisambandho attheva, atrāpi-
anya-e0806n2:52_1: ajādayo tvicchitatamā, ādisaddena ‘pattheti gāvuṁ purisaṁ dvijo’tyādayo saṅgahitā,
anya-e0806n2:52_2: nayatinī=pāpuṇane, vahati vaha=pāpuṇane, harati hara=haraṇe, jayatiji=jaye, sabbatthaleca
anya-e0806n2:52_3: ette ayādese ca rūpaṁ, daṇḍa=daṇḍane curādittā ṇimhi rūpaṁ, atha “adhisīṭṭhāsānaṁ
anya-e0806n2:52_4: kammaṁ”tyādinā (1-4-46) tena tena kammasaññaṁ vidhāya ‘paṭhaviṁ adhisessatī’ti ādo
anya-e0806n2:52_5: (tattha) tattha “kamme dutiyā”ti (2-3-2) dutiyā vidhīyate tehi tehi sattha kārehi,
anya-e0806n2:52_7: āha-‘adhipubba’iccādi, yāya vatticchāya dutiyā siyā tāya vatticchāya kammatā kathaṁhināmāti
anya-e0806n2:52_8: sambandho, neva upalabbhantīti kadācikassaci siyāti sambandho, payatitabbanti suttantaramārabbhanīyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:52_9: tatthevaṁ kiṁ bhavato manasi dosadhijambhanenāti attho, dhammeti etthāpi evaṁ saddaṁ
anya-e0806n2:52_10: yojetvā attho veditabbo, yathā ādhāre kammavacanicchā, tathehāpi ādhāravacanicchāti
anya-e0806n2:52_11: attho, tenevāha-‘dhammeti ādhāravacanicchā’ti, dhamme abhinivisateti sambandho, evaṁsaddasamānatthattā
anya-e0806n2:52_12: tathā saddassa tadatthānusāreneva viññāyatīti tathāsaddassa attho visuṁ na vutto,
anya-e0806n2:52_13: pānañca ācāroca pānācāraṁ, taṁpānācāramassa ādhārassa tasmiṁ tappānācāre, pānatthācāratthadhātusambandhī
anya-e0806n2:52_14: yo nadyādi ko ādhāro so pānācāravāyevāti āha- ‘pānatthācāratthānaṁ dhātūnamādhāre’ti,
anya-e0806n2:52_15: kesañcīti aniyamena kesañci saddasatthakārānaṁ, etthāti etasmiṁ ādhāravacanicchāpakkhe,
anya-e0806n2:52_16: patiparīhi bhāgecetyavasiddhāti iminā patisaddassa dhātunā ayuttataṁ dasseti… yadi
anya-e0806n2:52_17: yujjeyya chaṭṭhiyābhāvā, tenāha-‘yadātvi’ccādi, vuttiyaṁ tenāti tasaddena, apisaddopasaṅgahitaṁ
anya-e0806n2:54_0: Yadā kāladdhānamiccādinā‘māsamāsate kosaṁ sayati’ccādo akammakehipi yoge kālabhāvaddhadesānaṁ
anya-e0806n2:54_1: parehi kammattamanuññātanti ca, yadātviccādinā tu kiriyāva sabbenasabbaṁ na sūyati,
anya-e0806n2:54_2: tathā sati kuto ca kammattanti teheva vuttantī ca dasseti, gamma mānakiriyāyogopi
anya-e0806n2:54_3: na nissito… māsamāsateccādīsu āsanādi āsanādīsu (potthake) kiriyānaṁ māsādiyogo viya
anya-e0806n2:54_4: kalyāṇittaguṇādiyogo ca lokassa patītipathamupayātīti, na sijjhatīti kiriyā na honti
anya-e0806n2:54_5: guṇadabbānīti kiriyāsambandhābhāvā kammattābhāvoti na sijjhati, guḷena missā dhānā
anya-e0806n2:54_6: bhajjitayavā guḷadhānā. Ajjhayanakiriyāya pabbatena ca māsakosānaṁ sākallena sambandhābhāvā
anya-e0806n2:54_7: accantasaṁyogābhāvoti māsassātiādīsu na dutiyā. Pubbaṇhe samayanti iminā pubbaṇhe
anya-e0806n2:54_8: samayoti sattamīāmādisamāsaṁ dasseti, accanta mevāti iminā samayassa sākallena viharaṇakiriyāya
anya-e0806n2:54_9: sambandhamāha, yaṁsamayaṁ karuṇāvihārena vihāsi, taṁ ekaṁsamayanti sambandho, upasaṅkamanakiriyāyaccantameva
anya-e0806n2:54_10: yuttoti iminā nivāsanaviharaṇa kiriyāhipi pubbaṇhasamayādīnamaccantameva yuttataṁ
anya-e0806n2:54_12: vipallāso yathāpakatamatikkamma aññathā bhavanaṁ, idha pana sattami yampattāyaṁ sattamyatthe
anya-e0806n2:55_2: tathāpīti vuttakkamena karaṇattasambhavā tatiyāya vijjamānāyapi, siyāti tatiyā siyā,
anya-e0806n2:55_3: tañcāti taṁ karaṇañca. Kārakamajjheti ettha chaṭṭhī samāso kārakasaddena ca sattikārakaṁ
anya-e0806n2:55_4: gahitanti (āha) ‘dvinnaṁ kattusattīnaṁ majjhe’ti, abhinnassāpi hi ekassa devadattādikattuno
anya-e0806n2:55_5: bhinnānaṁ taṁsamavetānaṁ kattusattīnaṁ majjhe kāladdhānāni, sattibhedameva byañjayamāha-‘tathāhi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:55_6: ekatthāti ekasmiṁ devadatte, dvīhetīte (bhuñjikriyā) sādhananti sambandho, dvinnaṁ
anya-e0806n2:55_7: ahānaṁ samāhāro dvīhaṁ tasmiṁ. Isumasatīti vā, isumhi āso asseti vā nipphannena issāsasaddena
anya-e0806n2:55_8: gammamānaṁ kiriyaṁ dasseti ‘isvasane’ti, nanviccādi codyaṁ, dhanupañcasataṁ koso,
anya-e0806n2:55_9: evamaññateccādi parihāro, chaṭṭhiyāsampattāyanti kosassekadeseti evaṁ chaṭṭhiyā sampattāyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:55_10: muttasaṁsayenedaṁ samānanti mutto saṁsayo yasmiṁ avadhyādo tenetaṁ tulyanti attho.
anya-e0806n2:55_11: Vuttiyaṁ abhimatāti “sattamī pañcamiyo kārakamajjhe”ti (2-3-7) vacanena sattamīpañcamiyo
anya-e0806n2:55_12: papañcattamabhimatā, dvīhe bhuñjissatīti dvīsu divasesu gatesu bhuñjissatīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:55_14: bāhullaṁ nissāya vuttaṁ, dvīhā bhuñjissati kosā vijjhatīti dvīhā nikkhamma bhuñjissati,
anya-e0806n2:55_15: kosā nikkhamma ṭhitaṁ lakkhaṁ vijjhati upāttavisayo-yamavadhi, kose vijjhatīti kose
anya-e0806n2:57_0: Katacatthasamāsāti kato catthasamāso yesu te tathā vuttā, aññapadatthavuttayoti aññapadatthe
anya-e0806n2:57_1: vutti yesanti byadhikaraṇaññapadatthasamāso, cattasamāse gatyādīnaṁ visuṁvisuṁ padhānattā
anya-e0806n2:57_2: tehi paraṁ payujjamāno atthasaddo gatyādīhi paccekamabhisambajjhatīti maññate, atha
anya-e0806n2:57_3: sutte ‘payojje’iccetāvatyuccamāne payojjo sayaṁ kattāti kathaṁ viññāyati yena ‘payojje
anya-e0806n2:57_4: kattarī’ti vivaraṇaṁ katamiccāsaṅkiyāha-‘gatyādyattha’miccādi, ādisaddena bodhā dīnaṁ
anya-e0806n2:57_5: gahaṇaṁ, takkiriyāsamatthovāti tassā gatyādikāya kiriyāya samattho eva niyujjateti
anya-e0806n2:57_6: sambandho, kiriyākaraṇe samattho nāma kattāvāti āha-‘soca kattā’ti. Dutiyāya siddhāyāti
anya-e0806n2:57_7: vakkhamānanayena payojjassa kattuno kammattasiddhiyā “kamme dutiyā”ti sutteneva kamme
anya-e0806n2:57_8: dutiyāya siddhāya. Kiṁ lakkhaṇo-yaṁ niyamo yadatthami damārabhīyaticcāha-‘gatyādyatthāna’miccādi,
anya-e0806n2:57_9: paccudāharīyissate ‘etesameve’ccādinā, tathācābbhupagame, payojjo kattā na kammaṁ
anya-e0806n2:57_10: tyabbhupagamma payojje kattarī’ti vivaritanti attho, sāmatthiyampanaiccādinā sāmatthiyasarūpamāha,
anya-e0806n2:57_11: gati ādyatthānanti padacchedo, niyujjamāno payojakabyāpārasaṅkhātāya kiriyāya sambandhīyamānattā
anya-e0806n2:57_12: kammabhūtova bhavatīti attho, ayametthādhippāyo “gamanādikiriyāya sādhanattā yadipi
anya-e0806n2:57_13: payojjo kattā, tathāpi so payojakena gamanādīsu byāpāriyamāno payojakassa byāpāralakkhaṇāya
anya-e0806n2:57_14: kiriyāya sambandhīyamāno yadi kammaṁ na hoti aññathā kiṁ hotīti aññathānupapattilakkhaṇena
anya-e0806n2:57_15: sāmatthiyena kammabhūtova hotī”ti (attho) (potthake) ( ), patīyateti iminā patītivasenevāssa
anya-e0806n2:57_16: kammatā, sabhāvato tu payojjo kattāvātipi ñāpeti, payojakoti sabbattha devadattādiko
anya-e0806n2:57_18: atthaggahaṇassa, bodhatthassa udāharaṇanti seso, nanu vacanappayojanaṁ dassayatā
anya-e0806n2:57_19: vacanamevopadassiya pañho kātabbo, atha ‘etesamevā’tyavijjamāneneva kathaṁ tyāsaṅkiyāha
anya-e0806n2:57_20: ‘etesameve’ccādi, heṭṭhā vuttakkamena niyamatthattā vacanassa evakāro labbhati, sambandhivacanattā
anya-e0806n2:57_21: etasaddassa tena yathāpaṭhitā gatyādayova visessabhūtā saṅkhepena parāmasīyantīti
anya-e0806n2:57_22: ete samevāti katanti maññate evosañcāti maññate (potthake), (gacchati devadattoti…pe…
anya-e0806n2:57_23: nahotīti) iminā imamatthañca joteti “yadipi kiriyābhisambandhā payojjassa viya kattunopi
anya-e0806n2:57_24: kammattampasajjati, tathāpi payojjeti vuttattā kattari devadatte dutiyā nappasajjatī”ti,
anya-e0806n2:57_25: abhimatāti “gatibuddhyā”di (1-4-52) suttena payojjassa kattuno kammasaññaṁ vidhāya
anya-e0806n2:57_26: tasmiṁ payojjedutiyābhimatā, carahisaddo pucchāyaṁ, payojetīti asmiṁ uddese tadā
anya-e0806n2:57_27: kathaṁ bhavitabbanti sesoti yadācarahiccādivākyassāvasāne payojetīti asmiṁ uddese
anya-e0806n2:57_28: vacanasamīpe’tadā kathambhavitabba’nti pāṭhaseso hotīti attho veditabbo, yāvatāti
anya-e0806n2:57_29: tatiyantapaṭīrūpako nipāto, yasmā dattho vattate, yasmā dutiyā pappoti tasmā ‘yaññadattene’ti
anya-e0806n2:59_0: Niyameneccādinā vacanārambhassa payojanamāha, sāpi tatiyāpi dutiyāpiti vattabba yadātviccādinā
anya-e0806n2:59_1: harati nāhāratthe naharatyatthe (potthake) tipi viññāpeti, ubhayatthāti dutiyāya
anya-e0806n2:59_2: pattāya appattāya ca, vibhāsā vikappoti attho, kāretikara-karaṇe, lettāyādesātilatta
anya-e0806n2:61: Khādayati ādayati khāda, ada=bhakkhaṇe, avhāpayati vhe=avhāne āpubbo, “payojakabyāpāre ṇāpice”ti (5-16) ṇāpimhi pubbasaralopo, kandayati kanda=avhānarodanesu.
anya-e0806n2:62_1: dutiyā na bhavatī”ti, niyantā sārathi kiriyāsiddhiṁ niyāmakoti vatvā tameva pakāsetumāha-‘kiriyaṅga’miccādi,
anya-e0806n2:62_2: kiriyaṅga kiriyopakaraṇabhūtaṁ balī baddādiṁ kiriyākāraṇaṁ, niyametvāti ekasmiṁ karaṇīye
anya-e0806n2:62_3: kiriyā visaye patiṭṭhapetvā, vāhayati bhāraṁ devadattenetyatra hi devadatto paññavā
anya-e0806n2:62_4: puriso niyantāramantareneva bhāraṁ vahatītyaniyantuko kattā, vāhayati bhāraṁ balībadde
anya-e0806n2:62_5: iccatra tu balībaddā niyantā ramantarena na vahantīti saniyantukā.
anya-e0806n2:63_1: dutiyā na bhavatī”ti, atha kathamettha hiṁsatthatā bhakkhissa hiṁsā hi cetanāvati
anya-e0806n2:63_2: sambhavati, na cetthasassaṁ cetanāvantanti āha-‘sabbe’iccādi, sabbeti rukkhādayo,
anya-e0806n2:63_4: nanu buddhavacana nissitamidaṁ byākaraṇaṁ, tathā sati sammatameve-ttho-padassetvā
anya-e0806n2:63_5: gantabbaṁ kinnāmāññadassanopagātādhirenāti tuṇhī hoti nikkāraṇissā nikkammissā (potthake)
anya-e0806n2:63_6: bhavato-pāyoti viññāyati, paratthānubaddhakicchaṁ pana mahāpuññapaññā na kiñci viya
anya-e0806n2:63_7: maññanti, hoti (hi) etena parattho “matantarepi siddhi sissānaṁ, taṁtaṁ mataññuno
anya-e0806n2:63_8: vā kadāci karahaci yadidamavalokeyyuṁ te cetthāvatāraṁ cetthakāraṁ (potthake) labheyyuṁ
anya-e0806n2:63_9: etādiso ca paññavā paṭiladdhabuddhavacanappasādo’ti tadavatārena ca buddhe bhagavati
anya-e0806n2:63_10: kamena daḷhaṁ pasādaṁ paṭilabheyyu”nti, evamevaṁ tattha tattha taṁtaṁbyākaraṇodāharaṇappasaṅgepi
anya-e0806n2:64_1: vedāvedita (potthake) mahāpaññāpāṭavānaṁ paññavantānaṁ sāminā mahāsāminā sambuddhasāsanaratanavaropakārakena
anya-e0806n2:64_6: etthādisaddo pakāravācī, tena yācippabhutayo gayhanti, kammadvayayuttānanti niddhāraṇe
anya-e0806n2:64_7: chaṭṭhī, tena kammadvayayuttānaṁ majjhe duhādīnamappadhānepi gavādo kamme tyādippabhutayoti
anya-e0806n2:64_8: yojanā. Iccāditiādisaddena ‘avarundhati vajaṁ gāvaṁ avarundhīyate vajaṁ go’iccādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n2:64_9: pariggaho, gamanādyatthāna mityādisaddena bodhatthādīnaṁ gahaṇaṁ. Gamīyate gāmo devadattanti
anya-e0806n2:64_10: ettha kathaṁ payojjattasambhavoti āha-‘purise’ccādi, yajjapi gāmo tuṇhī hoti nibyāpārattā
anya-e0806n2:64_11: purisova tu gamanakiriyaṁ nipphādeti, tathāpi purisassa gamanakiriyāya yaṁphalappattilakkhaṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:64_12: tamubhinnampi gāmapurisānaṁ samānanti purisa kiriyātulyaphalattā gāmopi gamanakiriyāya
anya-e0806n2:64_13: kattubyapadese kāraṇaṁ bhavatīti adhippāyo, tathāhi gāmaṁ gacchanto koci gāme āsanne
anya-e0806n2:64_14: sati vadati ‘āgato gāmo patto gāmo’ti, atoññesanti ye kammadvayayuttā duhādayo gamanādyatthācodāhaṭā,
anya-e0806n2:64_15: etehi aññesaṁ, padhāne kammebhi ajādimhi padhāne kamme, padhānattampana ajādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n2:64_16: kiriyāya payojanattā, ajādyatthā hyānayanakiriyārabhyate. Ayampanettha saṅgaho-
anya-e0806n2:65: “Duhi yāci rudhi pucchi, bhikkhi ci bruvi sāsi ca;
anya-e0806n2:66: Ji daṇḍi patthi manthī ca, dhātū honti duhādayo.
anya-e0806n2:72: Payogo pana sambandhacintāyamiha ca vuttānusārena sabbathā viññeyyā.
anya-e0806n2:74_0: Pubbe kiriyānissayena kārakanissayena (potthake) dutiyāya vihitattā āha ‘idāni’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:74_1: dhisaddassa atthappadhāna niddesena vā ādisaddena vā ‘hā devadatta’ntipi hoti, hā
anya-e0806n2:74_2: devadattadukkhanti tu dukkhena yogā devadattena na yutto hotīti paṭhamāvāmantaṇe.
anya-e0806n2:74_3: Nanuca antarāsaddena yoge yathārājagahanālandāhi dutiyā (tathā) antarā ca rājagahaṁ
anya-e0806n2:74_4: antarā ca nā landa(nti tathā) antarāmaggeti ettha maggatopi antarāmaggatopi kasmā
anya-e0806n2:74_5: na dutiyāti tenāyogā, yesañhi taṁmajjhaṁ te tena yujjantīti tehiyeva dutiyā, athavābbhupagatepi
anya-e0806n2:74_6: taṁyoge taṁsambandhīyeva maggoti mukhyattā tato sabbassa (potthake) na dutiyā, atrāpi
anya-e0806n2:74_7: chaṭṭhīyeva pappoti antarā tañca mañca kamaṇḍaluiti, tava mama majjhe kamaṇḍalutyattho,
anya-e0806n2:74_8: atha kamaṇḍalusaddato dutiyā kasmā na bhavati satīpyantarena yoge tassa padhānattā,
anya-e0806n2:74_9: tathāhi kamaṇḍaluno sakatthā pavatti, tumhamhānantu paratthā-kamaṇḍaluvisesanattena
anya-e0806n2:74_10: tesaṁ pavattattā, tatra kamaṇḍaluno sakatthe vattamānattā padhānattenāvatattā pāṭipadikato
anya-e0806n2:74_11: accutattā parattā paṭhameva bhavatīti jīnindabuddhinyāsa. Nindādi lakkhaṇassa sambandhassa
anya-e0806n2:74_12: sabbhāvā sabbattha sambandhachaṭṭhiyā sampattāyaṁ vacanaṁ, ākatigaṇo-yaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:76_0: Lakkhaṇādīsvatthesuti nāmassā kassā (potthake) yamatthaniddesoti āha ‘abhināyo yutto’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:76_1: tenāti abhinā yuttassātthaniddesa kāraṇena, lakkhaṇasaddena hetu vattumicchitoti
anya-e0806n2:76_2: āha-‘tatthe’ccādi, duvidho hetu, vuttañhi subodhālaṅkāre “janako ñāpako ceti, duvidhā
anya-e0806n2:76_3: hetavo siyu”nti (252), samupalakkhayatīti samupalakkhaṇaṁ, saṅketamattaṁ ñāpakaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:76_4: na tu janakaṁ, saṅketopi lakkhaṇamuccate lakkhīyate kāriyamānenāti katvā, janakassāpyatra
anya-e0806n2:76_5: lakkhaṇattena gahaṇe payojanaṁ “anunā” (2-10) iccatra daṭṭhabbaṁ. Kañcipakāranti
anya-e0806n2:76_6: iminā itthaṁsaddassa atthaṁ vadati. Pattoti iminā bhūtasaddassa, ettha hi bhūdhātu
anya-e0806n2:76_7: pattiyaṁ vattate, rukkholakkhaṇanti rukkho ñāpakahetūti attho… rukkhena vijjuyā ñāpīyamānattā,
anya-e0806n2:76_8: ācariyajinindabuddhi pana aññathā vaṇṇayati, tassedaṁ mataṁ-
anya-e0806n2:77: Kriyāya jotako nāyaṁ, sambandhassa na vācako;
anya-e0806n2:79_0: Ayamettha attho “ayamabhi abhinandatityādīsu viya kiriyāya jotako na hoti, chaṭṭhī
anya-e0806n2:79_1: viya sambandhassa vācako na hoti, nikkosambītyatra gamanakiriyāpekkhī nisaddo viya
anya-e0806n2:79_2: nāpi kiriyantarā pekkhī, kiñcarahi sambandhassa tu bhedako visesako bhavatī”ti tamupadassetumāha-‘aññe
anya-e0806n2:79_3: tvi’ccādi, ettha itisaddo nidassane, rukkhampatvā vijjotate itievaṁ pattikiriyāya
anya-e0806n2:79_4: patvātivuttarukkhapāpanakiriyāya janitoti attho, tathāhi rukkhassa vijjuyā pāpanābhāve
anya-e0806n2:79_5: vijjuyā lakkhiyāya tallaṇassa ca rukkhassa yo lakkhiyalakkhaṇabhāvo sambandho, so
anya-e0806n2:79_6: kena sampādito bhaveyya, nanu sambandhe abhinā jotīyamāne rukkhassa lakkhaṇavuttitā
anya-e0806n2:79_7: kathaṁ jotīyatīti āha-‘lakkhaṇatthoca visayabhāvenā’ti, tathācetyādinā tasmiṁ pakkhe
anya-e0806n2:79_8: sambhāvitaṁ dosamubbhāvayati, tatrāya miccādinā yathāvuttadosaparihārāya parehevābhidhīyamānamparihāramāha,
anya-e0806n2:79_10: atoyevupari yathāvutta pakkhanissayeneva byākhyāyate, devadattassa sādhuttasaṅkhātaitthampakārappattiyā
anya-e0806n2:79_11: visayabhāvenāvaṭṭhitā mātā tattha vattati nāmāti āha-‘mātuyā’tiādi, mātā ca itthambhūte
anya-e0806n2:79_12: pavattā visaya bhāvena devadatto ca tattha visayībhāvena, tesañca visayavisayībhāvalakkhaṇo
anya-e0806n2:79_13: sambandho itthampattilakkhaṇāya kiriyāya jāto, so mātusambandho hoti kāraṇavasena,
anya-e0806n2:79_14: socātinā jotīyatīti mātu tenābhinā yogoti āha-‘yvāya’ccādi, mātusambandhoiti yojanā,
anya-e0806n2:79_15: itthampattiyāti itthampattilakkhaṇāya kiriyāya karaṇabhūtāya, evaṁ maññate “kiñcāpi
anya-e0806n2:79_16: so sambandho devadattenāpyavinābhāvīti tassa sobhinā jotīyate, tathāpi mātusambandhobhinā
anya-e0806n2:79_17: jotīyatīti ‘mātu tena yogo’ti ca (vuccati)… saddasattiyā taggatāyeva dutiyāya ubhayagatassāpi
anya-e0806n2:79_18: sambandhassa jotanato”ti rukkho rukkho tiṭṭhatīti sambandho, ṭhitimpaṭiccāti ṭhitinnissāya
anya-e0806n2:79_19: esaṁ rukkhānaṁ yo ca sambandhoti yojanā, rukkhānanti iminā rukkhā kiriyāya pare sambandhinoti
anya-e0806n2:79_20: ñāpeti, ṭhitimpaṭiccāti iminā pana tiṭṭhatisaddavacanīyā sādhyarūpā ṭhitikiriyā rukkhato
anya-e0806n2:79_23: viññeyyaṁ, so ca rukkhasambandho-bhinā jotīyatīti āha-‘so’tiādi, dvibbacaneneva jotanīyāti
anya-e0806n2:79_24: vicchātthe vuttimatte satīpi vibhattiyā vicchatthe vutkimattetyādivacanaṁ vicāreretabbaṁvitattiyā
anya-e0806n2:79_25: abisaddassaca vicchatthe vuttiyā abhāvā, lakkhaṇitthambhūti hi pakativisesanaṁ jotetumasamatthattā
anya-e0806n2:81_0: Upādiyamānoti abbhupagammamāno, yadi pana upādiyamāno bhāgo, anupādiyamāno kathanti
anya-e0806n2:81_1: āha-‘yo panā’tiādi, tagarakuṭṭhā gandhabbavisesā, mamābhajatīti maṁ ābhajati, mama
anya-e0806n2:83_0: Natulakkhaṇanti saccakiriyā vuṭṭhiyā hetu hoti, na tu saṅketoti attho, hetuttā lakkhaṇattābhāve
anya-e0806n2:83_1: saccakiriyāya kathaṁ lakkhaṇe dutiyāti hetuttepi lakkhaṇattamassa sādhento sādhammapayogenānvayamāha-‘yaṁ
anya-e0806n2:83_2: sakimpi’ccādi, ettha hi lakkhaṇaṁ sacca kiriyāti paṭiññā, pakkho (potthake) sakimpi
anya-e0806n2:83_3: nimittatāya kappanattāti hetu, yaṁ sakimpi nimittatāya kappate tampi lakkhaṇaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:83_4: yathā’api bhavaṁ kamaṇḍalupāṇiṁ sissamaddakkhī’ti sādhammapayogenānvayo daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n2:83_5: kappateti samatthoti attho, kamaṇḍalu pāṇimhi asseti kamaṇḍalupāṇī, apīti pañhe,
anya-e0806n2:83_6: kadāci kenaci kamaṇḍalupāṇīsisso diṭṭho so tameva dassanaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ katvā pucchati
anya-e0806n2:83_7: ‘api’tyādinā, atha yathā vuttena hetunopi lakkhaṇattamattu tathāpi paravippaṭisedhena
anya-e0806n2:83_8: hetumhi tatiyā kasmā na siyāti codayamāha ‘na nvevampi’ccādi, pubbavippaṭisedhenāti
anya-e0806n2:83_9: apavādapubbavippaṭisedhena, tathāhi chaṭṭhiyā pavādo hoti hetumhi tatiyāvidhi… sambandhachaṭṭhiyā
anya-e0806n2:83_11: yoge tasmiṁyeva sambandhe vidhānato, tattha hetutatiyāvakāso ‘dhanena kula’nti, upapadavibhattiyāvakāso
anya-e0806n2:85: Sahatthe-nuno vattane pabbatena yogo kathanti āha‘pabbatene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:87_1: tenāti anunā, kathaṁ tena yuttattaṁ ukkaṭṭhassāti hīnukkaṭṭhasambandhamukhena vibhāvento’tatthā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n2:87_2: tatthāti hīneccādinā vutte tasmiṁ, yatoti ukkaṭṭhasāriputtādiko, hīnoti paññavattādi(to
anya-e0806n2:87_3: nikkaṭṭho, so sāriputtādiko ukkaṭṭho) hīnatthavisayo jāyate… tabbisaye tassa ukkaṭṭhatā
anya-e0806n2:87_4: pattito, hīnukkaṭṭhasambandho pana atisāyanādikāya kāyaci kiriyāya katoti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:89_0: Kintaṁ ādhikyamiccāha- ‘adhikādhikīsambandho’ti, adhiko assa atthīti adhikī=khārī,
anya-e0806n2:89_1: athādhikīvinimutte adhikādhikisambandho kathamavasīyate nahyatrādhikī koci sūyaticcāha-‘navine’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:89_2: iti saddo hetumhi yathāvuttasambandhasādhano, tadopasaddenayogoti tadā upasaddenādhikinoyogoti
anya-e0806n2:89_3: attho. Dviṭṭhattā sambandhassa adhikassāpyupasaddena yogā tatopi kasmā na sattamītyāha-‘adhikamhātvi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:89_4: yathā ekāyeva vibhattiyā ubhayagatassāpi sambandhassa jotitattā vijjusaṅkhātalakkhiyā
anya-e0806n2:89_5: sattamyabhāvo, evamidhā pīti pubbe vuttasamādhimatidisanto āha-‘lakkhitā viya sattamya
anya-e0806n2:91_0: Kintaṁ sāmittamiccāha-‘sassāmisambandho’ti, kāya kiriyāya janitoti āha-‘paripālanādikiriyāya
anya-e0806n2:91_1: janito’ti, tañcāti sāmittāpekkho napuṁsakaniddeso, sambandhassānekavidhattā āha‘sabbattha
anya-e0806n2:91_2: sambandhe’ti, ākhyāyatetīmassa attho vidhīyate ñāpīyateti, diṭṭhanto-panītottho sukhena
anya-e0806n2:91_6: rājā’ti, tathā sambandhābhibyañjanakenādhinā yogepi visesanatova bhavati, nāññatoti
anya-e0806n2:91_7: āha-‘tatthā’tiādi. Byatirekamāpādīyatīti kārakachakkato byatirittattā sambandho byatireko
anya-e0806n2:91_8: taṁ āpādīyati pāpīyatīti attho, ubhayatoti saṁto sāmito ca, adhibrahmadatte pañcālāti
anya-e0806n2:91_9: brahmadattassa pañcālā santakā sāmino (potthake) ti attho, santakā sāmino (potthake)
anya-e0806n2:91_10: hi pañcālā, na sāmi nasaṁ (potthake), adhipañcālesu brahmadattoti pañcālānaṁ brahmadatto sāmītyattho.
anya-e0806n2:93_0: Kiṁ lakkhaṇo-yaṁ kattāiccāha-‘kattari’ccādi, gacchati devadattoccādo kattari patiṭṭhitaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:93_1: pacatyodanaṁ devadattoccādo kamme patiṭṭhitaṁ kiriyaṁ karotīti sambandho, karotīti
anya-e0806n2:93_2: ca iminā anvattha byapadesova siddho-yaṁ kattu vohāroti ñāpeti, kenaci payujjamānopi
anya-e0806n2:93_3: sake kamme sayameva padhānattamanubhavatīti‘payutto vā padhānabhāvenā’ti vuttaṁ hoti cettha-
anya-e0806n2:94: Padhānatāya yo kattu, kammaṭṭhaṁ kurute kriyaṁ;
anya-e0806n2:95: Sā kattā nāmappayutto, payutto vātyayaṁ dvidhāti.
anya-e0806n2:96_0: Tattha purisena katanti appayutto, purisena karoti devadattoti payutto, nanu kiriyā-yamabyavadhānena
anya-e0806n2:96_1: karaṇādhikaraṇe heva sādhyate kattārā tu dūraṭṭhena, tathāsati kathamanekasādhanasādhanīyaṁ
anya-e0806n2:97_0: Kattutoññesamubbhūtyā, vivittālocanādinā vavivekeca dassanāti vākyapadīye, pavivekeca
anya-e0806n2:97_1: kārakantharāmabhāvedissabhe kattarikriyā atthi bhavati vijjaticcādo titaṭīkā, tatiyapāthānaṁpāta 100, naṁpāta 243;
anya-e0806n2:99_0: Ayamettha attho “kattuno sakāsā aññesaṁ karaṇādīnaṁ ubbhūtyā sambhavenaca, tathāhi
anya-e0806n2:99_2: ṭhapetvā chindatī’ti, vivittassa karaṇādīhi puthabbhūtassa, kattuno kiriyāya ālocanena
anya-e0806n2:99_3: dassanena ca ‘devadatto atthi bhavati vijjatī’ti vuthabbhūtassānena ālocanena dassanenaca
anya-e0806n2:99_5: (tadadhīna) pavattiādīnaṁ gahaṇaṁ, iminā kāraṇena dūrato upakārittepi kattuyeva sappadhānatā siyā”ti, punapi-
anya-e0806n2:102_1: kasmāti ce yato kāraṇā atthe attano abhidheyyesaddassa vutti paṭipatti anādinā micchābhyāsenabhavati
anya-e0806n2:102_2: tasmā thālyādīnantiādi pakataṁ, kiṁ vuttaṁ hoti “aññathā saddattho, aññathā sabhāvattho,
anya-e0806n2:102_3: na hi saddo bāhye vatthumhi byāpāramāpajjati, tathāhi–
anya-e0806n2:103: Aññathe vāggi saṁsaggā, dāhaṁ daḍḍhoti maññati;
anya-e0806n2:105: Bāhyapadatthassa sabhāvo viya hutvā micchābhyāsena anādinā pana pavattena bāhye vatthūni avijjamānena karaṇabhūtena thālyādīnaṁ kattuttaṁ hotī”ti. Atha ca pana–
anya-e0806n2:110_0: Vuttehīti ‘kattutoññesamubbhūtyā’ccādinā, saddāvāti sadde tedhammā hontu vā mā vā
anya-e0806n2:110_2: vatthutoti attho, amukhyā vatthāhīti buddhiyā tadākāratāya pariṇāmāvatthāhi, hantyatta
anya-e0806n2:110_3: nāvattānanti ekassevāttano kammattādi jāyate, atoyevāccantamasantopi aṅkuro jananakiriyāya
anya-e0806n2:114_0: Kintaṁ karaṇaṁ nāmāti āha-‘yo panā’tiādi, yoti yo padattho, iminā idaṁ dīpeti “karaṇabyapadesāya
anya-e0806n2:114_1: suttantarābhāvepi karotyaneneti karaṇantyanvatthato pasiddho-yaṁ karaṇavohāro”ti, atredaṁ paṭibhānaṁ–
anya-e0806n2:117_0: Tattha yaṁvattumicchitaṁtyādinā idaṁ dasseti-“na vatthuto kiñci karaṇaṁ nāma atthi,
anya-e0806n2:117_1: vacanicchāvasena pana pasiddhakaraṇānampi pharasuādīnaṁ ‘pharasu chindati, pharasumhi
anya-e0806n2:117_3: thālyā pacatī’ti karaṇattassapi dassanato vacanicchātoyeva karaṇaṁ kārakaṁ viññeyya”nti,
anya-e0806n2:117_4: tañca duvidhanti āha-‘dvidhā hotī’tiādi, tattha asinā chindatīti bāhyaṁ, cakkhunā
anya-e0806n2:117_5: passatītyabbhantaraṁ. Kiriyānimittattā kārakanti iminā kārakasaddassa nimittapariyāyattamāha.
anya-e0806n2:117_6: Pakati yābhirūpoccādo kiriyāyāvijjamānattā sambandhamattaṁ viññāyatīti sambandhalakkhaṇā
anya-e0806n2:117_7: chaṭṭhī siyā, samena dhāvatītyādo tu kiriyāya vijjamānattepi kammattaṁ vattumicchitanti
anya-e0806n2:117_8: dutiyā siyā, samaṁ dhāvati visamaṁ dhāvatītyattho, tathā dvidoṇenāti dvedoṇe kiṇātītyattho,
anya-e0806n2:117_9: pañcakenāti pañca parimāṇassa pañcako pañcakaṁ vaggaṁ katvā pasavo kiṇāti pañcapañca
anya-e0806n2:117_10: katvā kiṇātītyatthoti vāttikakārena ‘tatiyā vidhānāyopasaṅkhyānaṁ’kataṁ, taṁ dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n2:117_12: taṁ kiriyaṁ kathayatīti sambandho, sabbasseva padatthassa sattābyabhicārato āha-‘bhū’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:117_13: pakatiyābhirūpoti sabhāvenāyamabhirūpo bhavati, na tu vatthālaṅkārādinetyattho, karotissa
anya-e0806n2:117_14: gammamānatte pana pakatiyābhirūpo katotiādi, tadā kattariyeva tatiyā, yaṁ yasmā aññagotto
anya-e0806n2:117_15: gotamo na hoti atoca gotamo bhavatīti sambandho, nanuca dvidoṇa pañcakā kayampaṭicca
anya-e0806n2:117_16: kammabhūtā honti dvidoṇādinā keyattā tato kimuccate‘kayampaṭicca dvidoṇapañcakā karaṇāni
anya-e0806n2:117_17: bhavantī’tyā saṅkīyāha-‘tathāhi’ccādi, idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti-“dvidoṇādisaddena hi na gayhupagaṁ
anya-e0806n2:117_18: vatthumuccati, tehi pana dvidoṇādyatthaṁ mūlaṁ tādatthiyā bhihitanti na vuttadosāvasaro”ti.
anya-e0806n2:119_0: Yathākkamamāgamanakiriyāya thūlattaguṇena gomantadabbena ca sambandhaṁ dassetuṁ ‘taṁ
anya-e0806n2:119_1: yathe’ccādimāha, udāharaṇamattaṁ dassentopi iminā adhippāyenāpi dassetīti vuttaṁ
anya-e0806n2:119_2: ‘sabbattheva vā’tiādi, puttena sahāgatotiādīsu āgamanādikiriyampaṭicca dve kattāro
anya-e0806n2:119_3: padhānāppadhānavasena, tesu padhāne kāriyasampaccayañāyena vā bahulaṁvacanena vā
anya-e0806n2:119_4: padhāne kattari paccayo, itare’kattari tatiyā’tyeva tatiyā siddhā, tato-yaṁ vacanārambho-natthakoti
anya-e0806n2:119_5: maññamānoco deti ‘nanvi’ccādinā, ttenābhidhīyate piteti padhānakattā, tulyopi kiriyāsambandhe
anya-e0806n2:119_6: pitāputtānaṁ pitātra padhānaṁ saddacoditattā, putto-ppadhānamasaddacoditattā, saddabyāpārāpekkhāya
anya-e0806n2:119_8: sambandho saddenoccate, netarassa saddasattisabhāvato, tathā vidhā hi saddassa satti
anya-e0806n2:119_9: yato piturevātra kiriyā sambandhaṁ sakkoti paṭipādetuṁ, na puttassa, evañcāgatoccādo
anya-e0806n2:119_10: ekavacanamupajjate, aññathā hi bahuvacanaṁ siyā, ‘pitā puttā āgatā’ti. (Yadi) vuttanayena
anya-e0806n2:119_11: tatiyā siddhā ‘siddhe satyārambho niyamāya vā vikappāya vā’ na cettha niyamo, nāpi
anya-e0806n2:119_12: vikappo, tato kimanena yogenā tyāsayenāha-‘appadhāneyeva’ccādi. Nayidamevamiccādi
anya-e0806n2:119_13: parihāro. Sahabhāvamattaṁ vattumiṭṭhaṁ vāti yojanā, sāmatthiyāti bhedādhiṭṭhānattā
anya-e0806n2:119_14: sahatthayogassa puttassāpi kiriyābhisambandho viññāyati kathamaññathā sahatthayogo
anya-e0806n2:119_15: siyāti iminā attha balena. Atthaggahaṇanti sutte “sahatthene”ti atthaggahaṇaṁ. Pariyāyatthanti
anya-e0806n2:119_16: parito ayanti avagacchanti atthamaneneti pariyāyo attho payojanaṁ yassāti viggaho,
anya-e0806n2:119_17: ettha ca pariyāyatthamevāti nāvadhāraṇaṁ, atoyeva vināpi sahasaddappayogaṁ tappariyāyappayogaṁ
anya-e0806n2:119_18: vā sahatthena yoge vidhānato asatyapi sahādisaddappayoge yattha tadattho gamyate
anya-e0806n2:119_19: tatthāpi bhavatyeva tatiyā… gamyamānena sahatthena yogā, yathā“syādi syāne”ti. (3-1)
anya-e0806n2:121_0: Lakkhīyatyanenāti lakkhaṇaṁ saṅketo, kintaṁ kamaṇḍaluppabhuti, atthe kāriyassāsambhavā
anya-e0806n2:121_1: taṁvācīhi vibhattīti maññamānena yaṁvivaraṇaṁ kataṁ ‘lakkhaṇe vattamānato’ti, tamullaṅgiyātthaṁ
anya-e0806n2:121_2: vadati ‘yo attho’iccādi, vattamānatoti viññāyati… nāmasmā paccayavidhānappa saṅgato,
anya-e0806n2:121_3: upāttoti gahito. Kañcippaṇaramāpannassa lakkhaṇe tatiyā yathā siyā ‘rukkhampati vijjotana’miccatra
anya-e0806n2:121_5: kataṁ, tammanasi nidhāya codayamāha–‘nanvi’ccādi, itthambhūtassa lakkhaṇanti chaṭṭhīsamāso,
anya-e0806n2:121_6: āpannassāti bhūtassa, sāmaññassa bhedako viseso pakāro vuccate, tathāhi ‘tidaṇḍakena
anya-e0806n2:121_8: patto, tassa tidaṇḍakaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ. Upalakkhaṇatteti iminā itthambhūtassa lakkhaṇattābhāvamāha,
anya-e0806n2:121_9: upalakkhaṇanti saṅketo. Nayidamatthiccādi parihāro, rukkhampati vijjotananti ettha
anya-e0806n2:121_10: kassaci itthambhūtassābhāvā itthambhūtaggahaṇe payojanaṁ na dissati tannivattanato,
anya-e0806n2:121_11: rukkhampati vijjotateti etthatu itthambhūtassa vijjusaṅkhātassa atthassa sabbhāvā
anya-e0806n2:121_12: tatiyāppattiyaṁ taṁnivattiyā yathāvuttaṁ ñāyamantarena nāññaṁ kiñci paṭisaraṇamatthīti
anya-e0806n2:121_14: vacane karīyamāne sati, itthambhūtavādino uttaramāsaṅkiyāha-‘nacā’tiādi, vattunti
anya-e0806n2:121_15: vacanaseso, co-vadhāraṇe, neva sakkāti vuttaṁ hoti, dutiyāvidhānasāmatthiyāti “patiparīhi
anya-e0806n2:121_16: bhāge cā”ti (2-9) kasmā na sakkāti āha-‘atthi’ccādi, asati hi payojane sāmatthiyanti
anya-e0806n2:121_17: bhāvo. Atha kamaṇḍalu pāṇimhi assāti ādo tatiyā kasmā na siyā tyāha-‘kamaṇḍalu’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:121_18: kamaṇḍalussa setassa ca upalakkhaṇa bhāvenānupādānatoti sambandho, iminā upādātuno
anya-e0806n2:121_19: savacasi satantatamāha, visiṭṭhāvayavādheyyenāti pāṇi kamaṇḍalunā visiṭṭhovayavo,
anya-e0806n2:121_20: tassādheyyo kamaṇḍalu tenāti attho. Yenāṅgena vikatena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate tato
anya-e0806n2:121_22: tattha yasaddena vikatāvayavo hetuttena niddiṭṭho aṅgasaddo ca samudāyavacano upātto
anya-e0806n2:121_23: tenāha-‘yeneccādi, nanuca kāṇādīnaṁ niyataguṇīnamabhidhāyittā akkhisaddassa payogo
anya-e0806n2:121_24: na yutto byāvattiyābhāvāti, nesa doso, lokiyo-yaṁ saddassa vohāro, lokassa ca saddappayoge
anya-e0806n2:121_25: gurulaghumpatyadayo natthi, tathāhi lokena ‘sīsapāti’pi vuccate, rukkho sīsapātipi,
anya-e0806n2:121_26: yassa tu tatthādaro, so-kkhisaddaṁ payujjateva, athavā sāmaññupakkame viseso payogamarahati,
anya-e0806n2:121_27: akkhi(nāti) hi vutte sandeho siyā ‘kimassa vattumicchita’nti tato kāṇoti vuccate,
anya-e0806n2:121_28: nākkhinā nirūpayati sobhanoti, kiñcarahi kāṇoti, akkhikāṇamassetyādo kasmā na siyāti
anya-e0806n2:121_29: āsaṅkiya‘kamaṇḍalu pāṇimhi assā’tyatra yo vutto parihāro, ta metthopadisanto āha-‘heṭṭhā viya appasaṅgo’ti.
anya-e0806n2:123_0: Kismiñci phale diṭṭhasāmatthiyetthe hetu niruḷho. Ekatra hi diṭṭhasāmatthiyottho
anya-e0806n2:123_1: taṁyoggatāya kāriya (ma)karontopi hetu vuccate sati saha kārinyasati ca vidhurappaccayo
anya-e0806n2:123_2: papā(ta) to, tena kāriyassa byabhicāro, tenevāha- ‘anipphādayantopī’ti, kāraṇe tatiyāyābhāve
anya-e0806n2:125_0: Upādhi visesanaṁ, parāṅgabhūteti parassa bandhattā(dino) vidhānā yāṅgabhūte jaḷattādihetumhīti
anya-e0806n2:125_1: attho, iminā guṇasaddo yamappadhānavacanoti vadati, yañcāppadhānaṁ tamparāṅgabhūtanti
anya-e0806n2:125_3: vādarūpenopādīyamānattā, yathā ‘jaḷattā baddho, rukkho yaṁ sīsa pattā, aggi ettha
anya-e0806n2:125_5: (2-3-25) evaṁ vidhānaṁ, itthiyantiādinā pañcamīrūpassapi abhimatabhāvaṁ dasseti,
anya-e0806n2:125_7: kathaṁ pañcamyantatā tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘pañcaminiddese’ iccādi, iminā suttena pañcamiyā
anya-e0806n2:125_8: vināti yojanā, vā pañcamiyā vidhānato tatiyārūpenapi bhavitabbanti codanamanasi nidhāya
anya-e0806n2:125_9: pañcamyu dāharaṇeyeva kāraṇaṁ tatiyodāharaṇassa ca paṭhamodāharaṇānusārenānu mantabbatañcadassento
anya-e0806n2:127_1: yoggatā’ iccādi, saddasattisāmatthiyāti saddasattisaṅkhātāya sāmatthiyā, tameva phuṭayati
anya-e0806n2:127_3: udarādīhi, tajjotanāyāti hetvatthajotanāyālanti sambandho, byatirekena tu hetvatthato
anya-e0806n2:129: Nāmabhūtehīti sabbādīsu keci kesañci yadi nāmāni siyuṁ tehi, appadhānabhūtehīti piyasabbādīhi, kimpayojanantiādo payojanasaddo “payojanaṁ kāriyahetūsu”ti nighaṇḍuto hetuvacano.
anya-e0806n2:131_0: Yassa sacetanāyācetanāya vā kassaci, pūjānuggahakāmatta mantarena sammāpadānaṁ na
anya-e0806n2:131_1: sambhavatīti āha-‘pūjā’ iccādi, tenāti yathāvuttenatthena, cāgaṅganti dadātino dānakiriyāya
anya-e0806n2:131_4: tesaṁ vasena, idha sampadānantidhā vuttaṁ kathitaṁ, keteti āha-‘rukkhayācakabhikkhavo’ti,
anya-e0806n2:131_5: rukkhādikaṁ taṁ sampadānaṁ vibhāgena dassetumāha-‘tattha hi’ccādi, ajjhesanenārādhanena
anya-e0806n2:131_6: sampadānaṁ bhavatīti sambandho, anumatiyā abbhanujānena, vijjamānepyanirākaraṇe bhikkhuno-dhikamanumatantyadhippāyenāha-‘so’ iccādi.
anya-e0806n2:133_0: Payojanapariyāye atthasadde sati idanti payojanaṁ parāmaṭṭhuṁ sakkāti ‘tasseda’ntiādi
anya-e0806n2:133_1: vuttaṁ, tasaddenettha vikatiyātisambandho, atthasaddena tu pakatiyā, attha kathanametanti
anya-e0806n2:133_2: iminā vacanicchāya metissaṁ natthi samāsoti dīpeti, viggahe vāsmimimasmāyeva nipātanā
anya-e0806n2:133_3: samāso daṭṭhabbo,so vikatisaṅkhāto attho, pakatitvaññapadatthenākkhipīyate, tato
anya-e0806n2:133_4: tadatthasaddato, koyaṁ tadattha bhāvo ccāha-‘tadatthabhāvo nāmā’tiādi, nimittaṁ yūpādivikati,
anya-e0806n2:133_5: nimittīdāruādipakati tasaddenātthasaddena ca gahitā, tesaṁ sambandho tadatthasaddassa
anya-e0806n2:133_6: pavattinimittaṁ tadatthabhāvo nāmāti attho, hetu hetumantabhāvalakkhaṇo sambandho
anya-e0806n2:133_7: nāmāti vuttaṁ hoti, padhānāvacchedaguṇasmāti vidhīyamānattena padhānassa purisassa
anya-e0806n2:133_8: ācchedakā visesakā guṇā, yañhi vidhīyate ñāpīyate tampadhāna, mitaramappadhānamanuvajjamānattā,
anya-e0806n2:133_9: yadā upādīyateti vatvā upādīyamānappakāraṁ diṭṭhantena phuṭayitumāha-‘yathā’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:133_10: yūpo nimittaṁ yassa dāruno taṁ tathā vuttaṁ nāññanimittanti yadā nimityavacchedakattenupādīyate
anya-e0806n2:133_11: tadā nimittasaddatova catutthī sambandho, tato aññanimittato, nimittanimittīnaṁ sambandhassa
anya-e0806n2:133_12: abhimukhabhāvena tattheva nimitte pavattīti sambandho, nimittasaddato hetutatiyāpi
anya-e0806n2:133_13: nāsaṅkanīyāti sambandho, kāraṇamāha-‘nimitta’ hetu iccādi. Ubhayatthāti yūpāya pākāyāti ubhayattha.
anya-e0806n2:134_0: Piṇiyamānā kiṁ saddādivacanīyā paro sāduādiko yo-ttho so añño kattā yassa so aññakattuko-bhilāso,
anya-e0806n2:134_1: abhilāso rucīti iminā dityādyanekatthantopi rucisaddo-bhilāse ruḷhova gayhatīti vadati,
anya-e0806n2:134_2: sā ruci attho-bhidheyyo yesaṁ bhe tadatthā, tesaṁ sambandhino piṇiyamānassa, iminā
anya-e0806n2:134_3: ca kiñcāpi rucirayaṁ yassuppajjateyo vā tassā janako, tesamubhinnampi atthi, tathāpi
anya-e0806n2:134_4: yassuppajjate sova tassādhikaraṇaṁ, ajanakopi so tāya saṁsattoti tasseva piṇiyamānassa
anya-e0806n2:134_5: sampadānasaññā, natujanakassa tāyāsaṁsattassāti dīpeti, idhāti iminā sakkate udāharaṇānamasamānarūpakaṁ
anya-e0806n2:134_6: dasseti, iminā ca udāharaṇānamasamāna rūpattameva catutthīvidhāne kāraṇaṁ, aññathā
anya-e0806n2:134_7: chaṭṭhīyeva tehipi vidhīyeyya kāraṇāsambhavā kāraṇasabbhāvā hi dīpeti, īdisassa paccudāharaṇa(ssa)
anya-e0806n2:134_9: idha kathanti āha-‘ihatvi’ccādi, tvanti attamatte paṭhamāyeva, sambhave kāraṇantaramāha-‘athavā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:134_10: natthi añño kattā yassā sā anaññakattukā ruci, bhāya ruciyā sambandhino piṇiyamānassa
anya-e0806n2:134_11: sampadānasaññaṁ ye pana icchantīti sambandho, ye pana āhu cātisambandho, uppajjanamuppatti,
anya-e0806n2:134_12: kassa uppatti, ruciyā, uppattiyā ādhāro uppatyādhāro‘devadattāya rocate’ccādo devadattādiṁ
anya-e0806n2:134_13: upalakkhetīti uppatyādhāropalakkhaṇaṁ vacanaṁ, ettha ruciyā uppatyādhāropalakkhaṇameva
anya-e0806n2:134_14: vacananti sāvadhāraṇa mattho daṭṭhabbo… sabbesaṁ vākyānamavadhāraṇaphalattā, tena
anya-e0806n2:134_15: piṇiya mānavacanamabhilāsassa aññakattukatāsandassanaparaṁ na hotīti byavacchinnambhavati,
anya-e0806n2:134_16: tesaṁ kaccāyanassa cehāpi pasajjatīti sambandho, ihāpīti tvamiti etthāpi, aññathāsiddhattāti
anya-e0806n2:134_17: atthamatte paṭhamāya eva siddhattā, vacanassāti ubhinnampi catutthīvidhānavacanassa,
anya-e0806n2:134_18: atippasaṅgocāti “kassa vā tvaṁ dhammaṁ rocesī”tiādo tavāti anabhimataṭṭhānappattica.
anya-e0806n2:135_0: Dhārippayogeti dhāridhātuno payoge, uttamīṇo adhamīṇoti dhanikagahetūnaṁ ruḷhītyāha-‘uttamīṇo
anya-e0806n2:135_2: dhāraṁdhātuto. Suttantarena (taṁ taṁ) niyamena niyamitānaṁ tesaṁtesaṁ sampadānasaññaṁ
anya-e0806n2:135_3: vidhāya catutthī vihitā parehi, tadāha ‘silāgha hanuṭṭhāsapāna’miccādi, sabbattha
anya-e0806n2:135_4: yogasambandhe chaṭṭhī, ñāpetunti silāghādike bodhetuṁ, icchitoti atimato. Tadatthavācīnañca
anya-e0806n2:135_5: dhātūnaṁ saṅgahaṇatthaṁ ‘kudhaduhissosūyatthāna’nti vuttaṁ, yampati kopoti iminā
anya-e0806n2:135_6: kopassa visayamāha, yassāti iminā yaṁkārakanti vuttameva parāmasati, yassāti rājādino,
anya-e0806n2:135_7: pucchatīti pucchiyate, teneva vakkhati-‘yassa sambandhiṁ subhāsubhaṁ pucchati nemittiko’ti,
anya-e0806n2:135_8: yocānukūlattambha jatīti iminā idaṁ dasseti “patipubbako āpubbakoca suṇoti abbhupagame
anya-e0806n2:135_9: paṭijānaneca vattate, yadāyamabbhupagamo patthanā pubbato bhavati tadā patthanāya
anya-e0806n2:135_10: kattu patthayituno catutthī rūpambhavati, yadātvapatthatampi kevalamānukūlyena vattamānaṁdisvā
anya-e0806n2:135_12: pavattanasaṅkhātāya kiriyāya kattuno catutthīrūpambhavatī”ti, iminā ca pāṇiniyavuttikārassa
anya-e0806n2:135_13: jayādiccassamate byabhicāramāha, so hi “abbhupagamo nāma parena patthitassa bhavati
anya-e0806n2:135_14: tattha patthayituyeva catutthīrūpambhavatī”ti vadati, pubbassākiriyāya yo kattāti
anya-e0806n2:135_15: vedavākyena vihitathutikakaraṇa saṅkhātāya ussāhānujānanato pubbabhūtāya kiriyāya
anya-e0806n2:135_16: yo kattā hotā potā ca, sabbatthāpi‘tassā’ti idaṁ ‘catutthīyāyadabhimataṁ rūpa’ntiiminā
anya-e0806n2:135_17: sambandhitabbaṁ, chaṭṭhiyā sabbabyāpibhāvamālamba evanti atidesoti āha ‘evantī’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:135_18: rūpasāmyato pana tādatthiyatthasabbhāvāca yathāyogaṁ tādatthha catutthīpi na virujjhati,
anya-e0806n2:135_19: vakkhati hi‘tādatthha vacanicchāyantu ‘iccādinā, icchito rājā, kamma vacanicchāti
anya-e0806n2:135_20: iminā vacanicchāya padhānattamāha… vacanicchābhimukhattā sabbesaṁ kārakānaṁ, appacurappayogattāti
anya-e0806n2:135_21: abahuppayogattā, hanute apanayati, upatiṭṭhate upaṭṭhānaṁ upagamanaṁ karoti, pihayanti
anya-e0806n2:135_22: patthenti, kujjha amarisaṁ karoti, duhanādayo kopappabhavā nānantarena te sambhavantīti
anya-e0806n2:135_23: dūbhādayopyudāhaṭā “byañjane dīgharassā”ti (1-33) rasse aparajjhāmi, issayanti nasahanti,
anya-e0806n2:135_24: ārajjhati pucchito nemittiko upaparikkhati, bhādatthhaṁ vibhāveti ‘yasse’ccādinā,
anya-e0806n2:135_27: aññasmāpīti ayācitutoapi, thutikaraṇassa kattubhūtā hotāpotāro ussāhanānujānanānaṁ
anya-e0806n2:135_28: kammaṁ hotīti āha-‘paccanupubbassa giṇātissa kamme’ti. Hotupotusaddehiccādinā potusaddassapi
anya-e0806n2:135_29: chaṭṭhirūpaṁ dassitaṁ, vuttiyantu ‘hotu patigiṇāti’cceva pāṭho dissati, hotvevampityamhākamatropekkhā,
anya-e0806n2:135_30: ussāhayatītyatthe giṇāti antogataṇyattho. Anāvādoti nāvāannādivajjite. Ettha pana
anya-e0806n2:135_31: tathā paṭisedhābhāvepi bahulādhikārato ‘na taṁ nāvammaññe nataṁ annammaññe’ccādi
anya-e0806n2:135_32: bhavati, attheva hi bahulādhikāratovā tippasaṅgābhāvo, paṭhamantaṁ rūpanti maññamānoti
anya-e0806n2:135_33: paṭhamantaṁ rūpaṁ, etthaca yadā tiṇāditopi khikaṁsīyate tadā nindāvagamo, tattha
anya-e0806n2:135_34: ca niyogatova nañpayogo ñāthānupa pattiyāti sappaṭisedhamudāhaṭaṁ ‘na maññamāno’ti,
anya-e0806n2:135_35: avadhimhiyeva pañcamītiṇāti, nañpayogeva niyogato nindāvagamā tiṇanti kammeyeva dutiyā,
anya-e0806n2:135_36: athavā satīpi nindāvagame vacanicchāto savisayeyeva dutiyā, sammutippayogeti sammutisaddassa
anya-e0806n2:135_37: payoge, catutthiṁ icchantīti mattāyāti ettha catutthiṁ icchanti, puna ruttatte kāraṇamāha-‘atha
anya-e0806n2:135_38: sotivijjamānattā’ti, caṇḍassa kukkurassātiādisutte “atha so”ti pāṭhassa vijjamānattā
anya-e0806n2:135_39: ‘bhiyyoso mattāyā’ti ettha sokāro punaruttoti adhippāyo, caggahaṇenāti “silāghahanu…pe…
anya-e0806n2:135_40: sattamyatthesucā”ti sutte caggahaṇena, catutthībhimatāti “namo yogādisvapicā”ti suttena.
anya-e0806n2:137: Avadhīyate visilissate etasmātyavadhi, avapubbāya dhādhātuto avadhimhi“dādhātvī”ti (5-45) i.
anya-e0806n2:140_0: Etthāyamattho “yatokutocipi attho kiñci vatthuavadhīyate saṁyogassa vā kiriyānimittaṁ
anya-e0806n2:140_1: gamanadānādikiriyāpubbaṁ visilissate sayaṁ vā apeti aññena vā visuṁ karīyate, tamevaṁvidhaṁ
anya-e0806n2:140_2: calañcā calañca visilesaparicchedabhūtaṁ padatthamavadhiṁ vadanti budhā tabbiduno”ti,
anya-e0806n2:140_3: taṁ yathā dhāvatāssā puriso patati, purisaṁ pāteti vā, rukkhā paṇṇaṁ patati, paṇṇaṁ
anya-e0806n2:140_4: pāteti vāti, soca tidhāpyuccate visayabhedena, yathā–
anya-e0806n2:143_0: Tattha niddiṭṭhā vacanopanītā kiriyā visayo yattha so niddiṭṭha visayo vadhi, yathā-‘gāmasmā
anya-e0806n2:143_1: āgato’ti, upāttājjhāhaṭā kiriyā visayo yattha so upāttavisayo, yathā-‘valāhakā vijjotate’ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_2: valāhakā nikkhamma vijjobhateti attho, anumeyyā kiriyā visayo yattha so anumeyyavisayo,
anya-e0806n2:143_3: yathā‘māthurā pāṭaliputtakehi abhirūpatarā’ti, ettha abhirūpaguṇena ukkaṁsanamanumeyyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_4: atoyevetthāyameva saññā paripphuṭā viññāyatīti na kācidiha saññā paribhāsīyate byāmohakāriṇī,
anya-e0806n2:143_5: athāvadhismāti vuccamāne ‘padatthāvadhismā’ti kuto-vasīyate yenevaṁ vivaraṇaṁ katantyāsaṅkiyāha-padāna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n2:143_6: Yathā gāmasmātiādinā idaṁ dīpeti “na kevalaṁ kāyasaṁsaggapubbakova visileso, kiñcarahi
anya-e0806n2:143_7: buddhisaṁsaggapubbakopi, atthi ceha buddhisaṁsagga pubbako, tathāhi corehi bhāyatityādo
anya-e0806n2:143_8: yo (bhaya)pekkhaṇa sīlo bhavati, so yadi maṁ corā passeyyuṁ, dhuvaṁ me maraṇanti
anya-e0806n2:143_9: vicārento te buddhiyā pappoti pappuyya ca tato nivattate, tathā corehi tāyatityādo
anya-e0806n2:143_10: yo ekassa mitto bhavati so yadyetaṁ corā passeyyuṁ dhuvamassa maraṇanti passanto
anya-e0806n2:143_11: te buddhiyā patvā tato nivattayatītyavadhittā avadhismāva sabbattha pañcamī”ti, parehi
anya-e0806n2:143_12: pana etādisesu sabbattha paṭipattuvisesānuggahāya sutteheva papañco kato, idha pana
anya-e0806n2:143_13: sāmaññavacaneneva siddhattā tadanuggahāya udāharaṇeheva papañcitaṁ, bhītibhāyanatthānanti
anya-e0806n2:143_14: bhīti tāyanānaṁ attho yesaṁ te bhītitāyanatthā tesanti attho, nanu bhītyatthānaṁ
anya-e0806n2:143_15: payoge bhayahetu sambhavati natu tāyanatthānanti, nesa doso, tāyanañhi rakkhanamuccate
anya-e0806n2:143_16: sāyanāhi rakkhanamuppajjabhe (potthake) tañca bhayahetuto vetyāha-‘yo bhayahetu’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:143_18: tatoti bhayahetuto, tesanti bhayatāyanānaṁ, bhayamaniṭṭhapātasaṅkā, uttāsotyattho,
anya-e0806n2:143_19: tāyana maniṭṭhapātato parirakkhanaṁ, yathā dassanaṁ hontevātīminā vacanicchāyeva
anya-e0806n2:143_20: padhānattamāha, ko hi lokiyaṁ vacanicchamativattituṁ sakkoti, tathāhi sabbeva dabbādayo
anya-e0806n2:143_21: sabbakārakasattiyuttāva, tatthāyaṁ kārakavibhāgo vacanicchāvaseneva, taṁ yathā ‘valāhako
anya-e0806n2:143_22: vijjotate, valāhakena vijjotate, valāhake vijjotate’ti. Parāpubbassātiādinā “parājissāsayho”ti
anya-e0806n2:143_23: (1-4-26) saññāsuttaṁ paccakkhāti, asayho atthoti sahituṁ abhibhavitumasamattho attho,
anya-e0806n2:143_25: vuttaṁ, taṁ kathaṁ ajjhayanassāsayhattaṁ, yenāsayhattassāvadhittaṁ paṭipādayati tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘yaññadattānabhibhavo’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:143_27: (1-4-27) suttitaṁ, tadāha ‘vāraṇatthāna’miccādi, vāraṇamattho yesaṁ te vāraṇatthā,
anya-e0806n2:143_28: avadhimattavacanicchāyanti visesato vidhānamantarenā vadhimatta vacanicchāyaṁ, visesavidhāneti
anya-e0806n2:143_29: icchitoti visesavidhāne, cittassāvadhivacanicchāyampana cittato pāpaṁ nivārayeti
anya-e0806n2:143_32: tadāha-‘antaradhāne’ccādi, ayamupajjhāyo yadi maṁ passatīti sambandho, dassane dosaṁ
anya-e0806n2:143_34: maññamāno sissā ahaṁ kathannāma byavahito bhavāmīti antaradhāne byavadhāna nimittaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_35: yena attano adassanamicchatīti sambandho, antaradhāneti nimittasattamīcāyaṁ, ato
anya-e0806n2:143_36: āha-‘byavadhānanimitta’nti, byavahitoti antarahito, māmaṁ upajjhāyotyādinā udāharaṇatthamāha,
anya-e0806n2:143_37: byavadhānatthaṁ byavahitatthaṁ, “antaradhāneti kiṁ core na didikkhatī”ti paccudāhaṭaṁ
anya-e0806n2:143_38: parehi, tampaṭipādayamāha-‘yatthādassana’miccādi, core na didikkhatī (tya), tra hi
anya-e0806n2:143_39: yo core na didikkhati tehi attano adassanamicchatīti na antaradhānanimittaṁ, kintupaghātanivatyatthaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_42: sambhavatī”ti. Icchatiggahaṇaṁ kimatthaṁ adassanicchāyaṁ sati satyapi dassane yathāsiyā”ti
anya-e0806n2:143_44: dassane satīpi, tatoti upajjhāyato, avadhirūpatā evāti upajjhāyassāvadhirūpatā eva.
anya-e0806n2:143_46: trādhippeto, upayogavacanasāmatthiyā vijjāgahaṇatthaṁ sissavattaṁ niyamo, tatoti
anya-e0806n2:143_48: janino attho janyattho, kintaṁ jananaṁ, tatoti janikattuhetuto, pakatisaddena kāraṇamattaṁ
anya-e0806n2:143_49: gahitaṁparehi ‘puttā pamodā jāyate’ccādo puttāditopi yathā siyā’ti, duvidhaṁ (hi)
anya-e0806n2:143_50: kāraṇaṁ upādānakāraṇaṁ sahakārikāraṇañca, tattha kāriyenābhinnadeso ghaṭassa mattikāpiṇḍo
anya-e0806n2:143_51: upādānakāraṇaṁ, tasseva pana daṇḍacakkādi (kāriyena bhinnadeso) sahakārikāraṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_52: tesūpādānakāraṇasseha gahaṇe’siṅgā saro jāyate’ccatreva siyā, na tu ‘puttā pamodā
anya-e0806n2:143_54: bhavitabbaṁ… etthantare sambandha vacanicchāyapi sambhavato, tatra tiṭṭhantīti tatraṭṭhā,
anya-e0806n2:143_55: tesaṁ, loko-naññathāvādī vohārikajano, tattha bhavā lokiyā, navattu paṭibaddhāti
anya-e0806n2:143_56: lokavacanicchamullaṅgiya ahameva vadāmīti sakajjhāsayena vadanto vattā, tappaṭibaddhā
anya-e0806n2:143_57: na hotīti attho. “Pabhavo bhavatissā”ti (1-4-31) suttitaṁ, tadāha-‘bhavatissā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:143_58: paṭhamato upalabbhatīti atthakathanena janyattho-tra na sambhavatīti vadati, nahi
anya-e0806n2:143_59: himavā gaṅgāya kāraṇaṁ, sā hi aññehi evakāraṇehi uppannā, himavati tu kevalaṁ paṭhamato
anya-e0806n2:143_61: jigucchāpamādatthadhātuyoge pana kammādhikaraṇavacanicchā dissatīti vuttaṁ, avadhivacanicchāpi
anya-e0806n2:143_62: pana dissake ‘jigucchati nāhiriko pāpā’ti, dhammā pamajjatītipi hoteva paṭisedhābhāvā.
anya-e0806n2:143_64: yatoti devadattādito, “aññaityatthaggahaṇaṁ, tena pariyāyappayogepi bhavatī”ti aññehi
anya-e0806n2:143_65: byākhyātattā āha-‘bhinno devadattā’ti, ārāsaddassa dūratthattā āsavakkhayato ārā
anya-e0806n2:143_66: dūro bhavatī(tyattho u) pādīyatetyāha‘ārāsaddo dūrattho’ti, niddissamānapaṭiyogīti
anya-e0806n2:143_67: ‘devadatto sūro’ti niddissamānassa kassaci yo so dutiyo, so paṭiyogī. Disādesakālavuttīnaṁ
anya-e0806n2:143_68: disāsaddattena pariggahato āha‘disā desakālavācīnaṁ yoge’ti, pubbeva sambodhātiādīni
anya-e0806n2:143_71: tadāha‘yattha’ccādi, lyappaccayassa yatrāppayogo, tassattho ce gamyate, so lyaplopo,
anya-e0806n2:143_72: tvālopo lyapalopotyaviseso, pāsāda māruyha pekkhati āsane upavisitvā pekkhatīti idaṁ
anya-e0806n2:143_73: visayo padassanaṁ pubbaṁ yassāti kiriyāvisesane samāso, vakkhamānasabbadassanesupi
anya-e0806n2:143_75: apakkamati tato taṁ dassananti tato pāsādato tassa daṭṭhuno dassanaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ
anya-e0806n2:143_76: apakkamatyapayātītyattho, avadhibhāvo pāsādassāti viññāyati, yesanti vesesikānaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_78: nikkhamma visālībhavantaṁ visayadesamupagamma sakalamattanā diṭṭhaṁ passati raṁsirūpena,
anya-e0806n2:143_79: yathā kāhalā mūle kisā aggemahatī, tathā ñāṇindriyānī”ti, adhiṭṭhānadesanti indriyādhiṭṭhānabhūtaṁ
anya-e0806n2:143_80: cakkhugoḷakadesaṁ, visayappavattīti gocare pavatti, santatiyāti indriyapabandhassa,
anya-e0806n2:143_81: adhiṭṭhāna manindriyaṁ nāpajjateti sambandho, tatoti pāsādato, apakkantyāti apagamanena,
anya-e0806n2:143_82: yajjapi cakkhundriyaṁ cakkhugoḷakato bahi niggacchati, tathāpipāsādaṭṭhassacakkhugoḷakā
anya-e0806n2:143_84: visaye viññāṇalakkhaṇaṁ kāriyaṁ karonti sīlenāti pattakārīni, anindriyādhiṭṭhānadoso
anya-e0806n2:143_85: neti sambandho, tatoti pāsādato, yesampanāti khaṇikavādinova dasseti, atra hi cattāro
anya-e0806n2:143_86: pakkhā pattakārīnindriyāni, appattakārīni, cakkhusotāni appattakārīni sesāni vuttaviparitāni,
anya-e0806n2:143_87: cakkhuyeva pattakārī sesamaññatheti, catusveva tesu paṭhamapakkhadvayamupanyasya
anya-e0806n2:143_89: idaṁ ayuttamiva dissati… saddasatthassimassa buddhavacanopayogittena sogatasamayānuguṇappavattito,
anya-e0806n2:143_90: khaṇikavādino pana nissāyedaṁ sundarameva, manasikārādītiādisaddena cakkhuto cakkhunā
anya-e0806n2:143_91: (potthake) abhedo rūpāpāthagamo ca dassito, yoggadeseti dassanayogge padese. “Pucchanākhyānesu
anya-e0806n2:143_92: ca pañcamī vattabbā”ti (2-3-28vā) vuttaṁ, tadāha-‘pucchanasaddato’ccādi, pucchanākhyānesu
anya-e0806n2:143_94: devadattassetyākhyānaṁ, koso yañña dattoti pañho vidhirūpovāyaṁ, yo-ṅgadītyādyanuvādarūpamākhyānaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_96: tadāha-‘addha’ccādi, nimīyate paricchijjate yena taṁ nimānaṁ, tadeva nimmānaṁ. “Addhassa
anya-e0806n2:143_97: paṭhamā sattamī ca vattabbā”ti (2-3-28) vuttaṁ, tatthāyamattho “taṁ yuttāti vattate,
anya-e0806n2:143_98: taṁ yuttā pañcamiyutthā parassāddhassa paṭhamā ca sattamī ca vattabbā”ti, pāṭaliputtasmāti
anya-e0806n2:143_99: pañcami yuttaṁ, etāpi na vattabbāti dassetumāha-‘sattayojanānī’tiādi, atra hi yadā
anya-e0806n2:143_100: rājagahassa yojanañcābhedo vattumicchīyate, tadā pāṭaliputtasmā rājagahaṁ sattayojanānīti,
anya-e0806n2:143_102: Tathāhi pāṭaliputtasmā sattasu yojanesu sati rājagahaṁbhavatītyayamattho patīyate,
anya-e0806n2:143_104: iminā “taṁ yuttā kāle sattamī vattabbā”ti (2-3-28vā) vacanampaṭikkhipati. “Karaṇeca
anya-e0806n2:143_107: guṇe hetumhīti guṇapadatthe hetubhūte “guṇe”ti (2-21) pañcamīti attho, yathāvuttavidhāneneti
anya-e0806n2:143_108: “guṇe”ti sutte vuttavidhānena, “guṇe”ti sutte vuttavidhānena, yadātviccādinā paresaṁ
anya-e0806n2:143_109: viya karaṇe visuṁ vidhāne payojanaṁ natthīti dasseti. Kattabbarūpassa calanassāti
anya-e0806n2:143_110: sambandho, samānādhikaraṇattena visesananti yojanā, samānādhikaraṇattenāti ca ‘rañño
anya-e0806n2:143_112: visesanabhāvo cāssa thokaguṇānvite calane vattamāno thokasaddo asattavacanova visesananti,
anya-e0806n2:143_114: chaṭṭhī vā”ti (2-3-34) vuttaṁ, tadāha‘dūranti katthehi’ccādi, avadhisambandhalakkhaṇāti
anya-e0806n2:143_115: avadhisambandhāva lakkhaṇaṁ nimittamāsaṁ pañcamīchaṭṭhīnaṁ tā tathā vuttā, vattumiṭṭhoti
anya-e0806n2:143_116: iminā vacanicchāyeva padhānattamāha, evaṁ carahi taṁtaṁ kārakavacanicchāyamaññāpi
anya-e0806n2:143_117: vibhattiyo kasmā nappayujjeyyunti āha-‘lokiyā cetthā’tiādi, ettha vibhattīnaṁ niyame
anya-e0806n2:143_118: lokiyā eva vacanicchā nibandhanaṁ kāraṇanti attho, pañcamīcātyanuvattamāne “dūranti
anya-e0806n2:143_119: katthehi dutiyā ce”ti (2-3-35) vuttaṁ, “pañcamyadhikaraṇeca” (2-3-36) iccatra ca
anya-e0806n2:143_120: kārena dūranti katthehi sattamī ca vuttā pāṭi padikatthe sārasaṅgahakārādīhi, tadakkhippa
anya-e0806n2:143_121: aññāpadesena paṭikkhipituṁ kecityādi yaṁ vuttaṁ vuttiyaṁ, taṁ dassetumāha’kecīti
anya-e0806n2:143_122: sārasaṅgahādayo’tiādi. Dūrāpādāvasecananti ayaṁ tesampaṭikkhepana yoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:143_123: itisaddo panettha parihīno, nahitantiādīsu tasaddenāsattarūpaṁ dūrādi vattumicchitantyavaseyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_124: na hi taṁ gamyate, na hi tato gamyate, na hi tena gamyate, na hi tasmiṁ ṭhīyate’ti
anya-e0806n2:143_125: visuṁ sambandho vaseyo. Patīyantecāti co vattabbantarasamuccaye, atoceti vakkhamānahetuparāmāso,
anya-e0806n2:143_126: yanti yasmā atthe nipāto, vākyakāro vararuci, taṁsāmānādhikaraṇyatoti dūrādisā mānādhikaraṇyato,
anya-e0806n2:143_127: taṁyuttatopīti dūrādiyuttā gāmādisaddatopi, paccakkhantoti vākyakāravacanaṁ paccācikkhanto,
anya-e0806n2:143_128: tathāhyatrāyaṁ mahābhāssa pāṭho “dūrantikatthehi pañcamīvidhāne taṁyuttā pañcamīpaṭisedho
anya-e0806n2:143_129: vattabbo dūrā gāmassa, tatrāpi dassanā anatthako-yampaṭisedho, tatrāpi hi pañcamī dissati–
anya-e0806n2:145: Guruto kupitā dūrā,bhābyaṁ dūrā ca dassuhiti.
anya-e0806n2:146_0: Atra dūrantiketyādi vattabbaṁ vākyakāravacanaṁ, dūrā gāmassāti tassodāharaṇaṁ, tatrāpiccādi
anya-e0806n2:146_1: paccakkhānabhāssaṁ, dūrasmāvasathāti āvasathassa dūreti atthohi bhāssapadīpe keyyaṭo,
anya-e0806n2:146_2: paṭhamo puriso yassa so paṭhamapuriso bhavati “dūrantikā”di (2-6-5) kaccāyanasutte
anya-e0806n2:146_4: iti (2-6-2) sutte caggahaṇato pabhutiyogo ca gahito, tenāha–‘pabhuti yogecā’ti, pabhutiyogecāti
anya-e0806n2:146_5: iminā pabhutyatthayogopi saṅgahito, teneva ‘yatosarāmi attāna’nti udāhaṭaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:148_0: Nanu phuṭova tesaṁ sālādīnaṁ yogoti kimettha pañhena kassa panetehi yogo’tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘vajjanaṁ
anya-e0806n2:148_1: hiccādi, vajjanānanti kattari ano, vajjane sambandhe vattamānehīti vajjanasaṅkhāte
anya-e0806n2:148_2: sambandhe vatta mānehi apaparīhi, yuttasmāti yuttatova ekasmā, nāññato, kimettha
anya-e0806n2:148_3: vattabbanti iminā apaparīhi yuttasmāva pañcamībhavane pasiddhattamāha, pasiddhampetamāharitvā
anya-e0806n2:148_4: pakāsetumāha-‘kattuno’ccādi, yadatthoti yosālādi attho payojanaṁ yassa vajjanakiriyā
anya-e0806n2:148_5: rambhassa so yadattho. “Pañcamyapāparīhī”ti (2-3-10) āyuttepi pañcamī vidhīyate parehi,
anya-e0806n2:150_0: Diṭṭhasambandhassāti pasiddhavasena diṭṭhakāriyakāraṇassa mukhyassa, tassa kāriyatthanti
anya-e0806n2:150_1: tassa mukhyassa yaṁ kāriyaṁ, tadatthaṁ mukhyakāriya karaṇatthanti vuttaṁ hoti, tasmiṁ
anya-e0806n2:150_2: paṭinidhimhi vattamānena pabhineti sambandho, vinimayeti parivattana nimittaṁ paṭidānecāti
anya-e0806n2:150_3: ca saddassāṭṭhānappayutti daṭṭhabbā, patinā tassa yogoti sambandho.
anya-e0806n2:152_0: Yadi vajjanakiriyāya sambajjhamānassa kammattā kamme dutiyā, kimatthaṁ carahi puna
anya-e0806n2:152_2: yassā sā paṭipadavidhānā, visesavidhāna vatītyattho, yajjatra dutiyāvacanaṁ na siyā
anya-e0806n2:152_3: tadā ritesaddena yoge ujukaṁ vidhīyamānāya pañcamiyā dutiyā bādhīyethāti maññate.
anya-e0806n2:152_4: Yadyatra pañcamiyā dutiyāya bādhābhāvo eva payojanaṁ, evañcarahi ‘rite vā’ti suttayitabbaṁ
anya-e0806n2:152_5: evaṁ sati pakkhe dutiyā ca bhavissati, lahu ca suttampaṇītambhavatī tyāsaṅkiya payojanantaramāha-‘uttaratthañce’ti,
anya-e0806n2:152_6: atoyevāti uttaratthattāyeva, puna payojanantaraṁdutiyā gahaṇassa dassayamāha-‘vibhatyantare’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:152_7: āhacca kaṇṭhādiṭṭhāne vāyunāāhanitvā āharitvā vā vacanaṁ āhaccavacanaṁ, ujukavacananti
anya-e0806n2:152_8: vuttaṁ hoti, vibhatyantaraṁ chaṭṭhīvibhatti, tassa byudāsatthaṁ, nirāsatthantuttho,
anya-e0806n2:152_9: aññāpīti dutiyāya aññā chaṭṭhīpi, pakatāya pañcamiyā sambandhanattho pakatasambandhanattho.
anya-e0806n2:154_0: Na dutiyāpi yogavibhāgatoti evaṁ maññate “tatiyā ceti vattamāne tattha yadi cakārena
anya-e0806n2:154_1: ‘dutiyā ce’ti sambandhīyeyya, tatrāpi ca kārena pañcamītyevaṁ na kassāpyapakaṁsoti‘vināññatraputhanānāhi
anya-e0806n2:154_2: tatiyā ce’tyekayogamakatvā yogavibhāgasāmatthiyā ‘tatiyā ce’ti ca kārena jātu pañcamī”ti,
anya-e0806n2:154_3: asahāyatthatte sati ‘vinātthe hī’tyevamavatvā kiṁ visuṁ suttaracanāyetyāha-‘bhedo pādānantvi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:156_0: Yantaṁ saddānaṁ niccattā sambandhassa yatthāti parāmaṭṭhaṁ soti, yoti parāmaṭṭhaṁ
anya-e0806n2:156_1: tassāti ca niddisati, yo yatthetyādikañca ‘kiriyādhārabhūte’ccādivuttigantha vivaraṇanti
anya-e0806n2:156_2: yoti kiriyādheyyabhūtādhippetā, etanevāha‘kiriyā cā’tiādi, tenāyamādhārīyati kattukamma
anya-e0806n2:156_3: samavetā kiriyāsmintyadhikaraṇe vā taṁ ādhārayatīti kattari vā ghaṇantena daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n2:156_4: kattāraṁ kammañca kiriyānissayabhūtamādhāra yatītyādhāroti vā kattari ghaṇa, vuttaṁ hi–
anya-e0806n2:159_0: Nanu ca kiriyādhāraṇenādhārotyuccate, taṁ kimevamuccateti ce, nesadoso yadeva hi
anya-e0806n2:159_2: sambhavati tato kiriyā kāraṇenādhāraṇenādhārotya yamevattho, na kattukammapariccāgenādhārena
anya-e0806n2:159_3: ujukaṁ kiriyā gayhate, teneva vakkhati-‘kiriyāyayo ādhāro’ccādi, nanu yadyapyujukameva
anya-e0806n2:159_4: kiriyaṁ dhārayati kattā kattusamavāyiniṁ, kammasamavetañca viktedanādiṁ kiriyaṁ kammaṁ…
anya-e0806n2:159_5: tathā sati tānevādhāroti, na… loke satthe ca tesamādhāratthe nāppatītito, kattukammatāyeva
anya-e0806n2:159_6: hi tesampatītīti dassetumāha-‘kiriyā ce’tyādi, tathā ca vuttaṁ–
anya-e0806n2:162_0: Kattukammabyavahitanti kattukammehi taṁsamavetabhāvena byavahitaṁ, anuju pārampariyena,
anya-e0806n2:162_1: kriyāsiddhupakāriti kattukammasamavetāya kiriyāya pasiddhiyaṁ upakārī upakubbantaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:162_2: nanu ca na kiriyā dhāraṇenevāyamādhāro, kattukammānaṁ dhāraṇenāpyādhāroti sakkā vavatthapetunti
anya-e0806n2:162_3: codanammanasi nidhāyāha-‘na ce’tyādi, kiriyā nimittassevāti kattukammasamavāyiniyā
anya-e0806n2:162_5: cāya’miccādi, cattāro vidhāpakārā assāti catubbidho, ādheyyena sahopasileso saṁyogalakkhaṇo-ssa
anya-e0806n2:162_6: atthīti opasilesiko ādhāro-‘kaṭenisīdati thāliyaṁ pacati’tyādo kaṭādi, tathāhi devadattasamavetaṁ
anya-e0806n2:162_7: nisīdanakiriyaṁ kaṭo devadattaṁ dhārayaṁ dhārayati devadattabyavahitaṁ, evaṁ thālīpi
anya-e0806n2:162_9: kaṭādino. Yato-ññatrādheyyaṁ na vattate sabbathā bhiyyo vā, so vesayiko, visayohyādheyyassānaññatrabhāvo,
anya-e0806n2:162_10: yathā cakkhādippavattīnamaññatrābhāvā cakkhādīnaṁ rūpādayo visayāti vuccante, evamākāse
anya-e0806n2:162_11: sakunayotyādo sakunyādīnamākāsādito-ññatrābhāvāte tesaṁ visayātyuccante, visayo eva
anya-e0806n2:162_13: dadhimhi sappi,tyatra tilādikaṁ telādikamādheyyaṁ byāpetvā tiṭṭhatīti tilādi byāpakādhāro.
anya-e0806n2:162_14: Samīpe bhavo, samīpo eva vā sāmīpiko, yassa samīpadese ādheyyaṁ vattate so evamuccate,
anya-e0806n2:162_15: atrodāharaṇaṁ ‘gurūsu vasati gaṅgāyaṁ ghoso’ti. Nanu cātrāpyādhāre sattamī vidhīyate
anya-e0806n2:162_16: ādhāro ca nissayo vuccate, nissayo ca saṁyogasamavāyehi hoti, na ca sissādīnaṁ guruppabhutīti
anya-e0806n2:162_17: devadattasakunyādīnamiva kaṭākāsādīhi saṁyogo, telādīnamiva ca tilādīhi samavāyo
anya-e0806n2:162_18: vā atthi, tenāyuttaṁ te samādhārattanti, netadatthi, yadāyattā hi yassa ṭhiti so
anya-e0806n2:162_19: vināpi saṁyogasamavāyehi tassa nissayo bhavati, tathāhi purisassa na raññā saha saṁyogosamavāyo
anya-e0806n2:162_20: vātthi, atha pana tadadhīnaṭṭhitittā rājanissayo purisoti byapadissīyate, sissādīnañca
anya-e0806n2:162_21: guruppabhutina māyattā ṭhitīti tesamayaṁ tenassāyaṁ (potthake) yuttho te pati gurupabhutīnaṁ
anya-e0806n2:162_22: nissayabhāvo (jinindabuddhi) yutto guruppabhutinaṁ nissayabhāvoti, ettha pana yajjapi
anya-e0806n2:162_24: tatheva vacanicchā, nāññathā opasilesikena vā opasilesikeva visayābhibyāpakānamaggahaṇato
anya-e0806n2:162_25: upasilesasse vā upasilesasseva paribyattattā tatheva vohāroti na saṅkaro saṅkanīyoti.
anya-e0806n2:164_0: Nimittabhāvamattetīminā kammasaṁyogābhāvepi sattamiyā pavatti māha, na paresaṁ viya
anya-e0806n2:164_1: kammasaṁyoge eva, teneva vakkhati-‘evamaññate’ccādi, bāhirānaṁ hi-‘nimittā kammena”
anya-e0806n2:164_2: (caṁ, 2-1-89) iti suttaṁ, tattha kammena yoge payojanā sattamībhavatītyattho, ajinamhi
anya-e0806n2:164_3: haññate dīpītidīpinohananassa payojanaṁ cammaṁ, tassa dīpinaṁhantīti kammena yo go,
anya-e0806n2:166_0: Yassa kiriyāti yassa gavādyatthassa sambandhinī dohanādikiriyā, kiriyantarassāti
anya-e0806n2:166_1: gamanādikiriyantarassa, etenāti lakkhaṇanti etena, tato-ccassa vivaraṇaṁ kiriyāvatāti,
anya-e0806n2:168_1: ca “iti (2-3-39) āraddhaṁ parehi, tadāha-‘sāmi’ccādi, atra ca jinindabuddhinā “sāmyādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n2:168_2: bhedeno pādānaṁ pariyāyantaranivatyatthamiha mā hotu gāmassa rājā”ti vuttaṁ vākyamupanyasya
anya-e0806n2:168_3: hassāpya yuttattamupadassayamāha-‘sāmissare’ccādi, kena nivārīyate, na kenāpītyattho,
anya-e0806n2:168_5: (2-3-40) āraddhaṁ, tadāha-‘āyutte’ccādi, āsavā tapparatā, byāvaṭo niyutto, tatthedaṁ
anya-e0806n2:168_7: go sakaṭassā’ti pasajjatī”tyāsaṅkiya natthevetampi payojananti dassetumāha-‘vināpi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:168_10: sattamī” (2-6-40) “pañcamyatthe ca” (2-6-41) iti ca suttitaṁ, tenāha-‘kamme’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:168_11: gahaṇassa bāhā visayoti sambandho, kaccāyanānaṁ‘bhikkhūsū’tiādīni kammatthe udāharaṇāni,
anya-e0806n2:168_12: hatthesūtiādīni karaṇatthe, kadalīsūti pañcamyatthe. “Maṇḍitussukkesu tatiyā ce”ti
anya-e0806n2:168_13: (2-6-45) kaccāyanasuttaṁ, tadāha ‘pasannatthe’ccādi, pasannattheti maṇḍitatthe, ussukkattheti ussāhatthe.
anya-e0806n2:170_0: Visuṁ karaṇaṁ niddhāraṇaṁ, jinindabuddhācariyena “kimatthampunaridaṁ vacanaṁ yāvatā
anya-e0806n2:170_1: niddhāriyamāno-vayavo samudāyabbhantaro, tattha yadā samudāyassā-dhikaraṇattaṁ vattumicchīyate,
anya-e0806n2:170_2: tadā sattamī siddhāva, yathā rukkhe sākhāti, yadā tvavayavasambandho tadā chaṭṭhī,
anya-e0806n2:170_3: yathā rukkhassa sākhāti saccametaṁ papañcatthantu vacana”nti vuttaṁ, tañceta mayuttantidassento
anya-e0806n2:170_4: āha-‘na sālayo’ccādisūkayuttānidhaññāni sūkadhaññāni, āhitā avaṭṭhitā, ādheyya bhūtāti
anya-e0806n2:170_5: vuttaṁ hoti. Yatoti āhitattakāraṇā, tatoti yato jinindabuddhivacanamevamayuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:170_6: tasmā kāraṇā. ‘Pañcamī vibhatte”ti (2-3-42) pāṇinīya suttaṁ, tadāha-‘samudāyato’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:170_7: sutato sakāsā sīlaṁ atisayena seyyoti sambandho, “niddhāraṇe chaṭṭhī sattamīsu pattesu
anya-e0806n2:170_8: tadapavādo, yaṁ yogo”ti parehākhyāyate, tattha tāva niddhāraṇamevettha natthi kuto
anya-e0806n2:170_9: chaṭṭhīsattamīnaṁ tatthappavatti, yato tāsaṁ bādhanatthamidamārabbhateti dassayamāha-‘nātra
