anya-e0806n2:170_10: jātyādīhi’ccādi, nahiccādinā jātyādīhi niddhāraṇābhāvaṁ dasseti, jaccādīnanti niddhāraṇe
anya-e0806n2:170_11: chaṭṭhī, kuto na bhavaticcāha-‘jaccādisambandhene’ccādi, ataṁ byapadesatoti sīlattādibyapadesābhāvato,
anya-e0806n2:170_12: puna niddhāraṇābhāve hetvantaramāha-‘tulyānañce”ccādi. Sādhunipuṇehi yoge pūjāyaṁ
anya-e0806n2:170_13: gammamānāyaṁ sattamī, tathā asādhuyoge, tathā pasitaussukkehi yoge tatiyāsattamiyo,
anya-e0806n2:170_14: tathā lopantanakkhattasaddā ca tena tena vacanantarena pāṇiniyehi vihitā, taṁ sabbaṁ
anya-e0806n2:170_15: taṁtaṁkārakavacanicchāyameva sādhetuṁ ‘mātari sādhu’ iccādayo udāhaṭā kesesu pasito
anya-e0806n2:170_16: pasatto, avabaddhoti attho, kesehi karaṇabhūtehi pasito bhavati, kattubhūtehi vā
anya-e0806n2:170_17: pasito katoti attho, phusseninduyuttena lakkhito kālo soyamityabhedena sambandhā
anya-e0806n2:172_0: Paṭhamātthamatteti ettake vuttepi vākyattho padattho vā na viññāyate nāmaggahaṇānuvattitoti
anya-e0806n2:172_3: pakatirūpenāti nāmena, tassa abhidheyyassa, mattasaddassātiādinā sāmaññantīdaṁ mattasaddassatthavacananti
anya-e0806n2:172_4: dasseti, idaṁ vuttaṁ hotīti nāmassābhidheyyamatteti iminā idaṁ vakkhamānaṁ vuttaṁ
anya-e0806n2:172_7: parimāṇaṁ paricchedo, saṅkhyā ekattabahuttāni, tabbantopi saddatthoevāti liṅgādivantopi
anya-e0806n2:172_8: sarūpā byatiritto saddattho eva, uccattanīcattasāmaññampurodhāya pavattiyā uccanīcasaddehi
anya-e0806n2:172_9: paṭhamā hoteva, taṁyuttassāpi saddatthabhāvato ‘uccaṁ gharāni’tyādīnipi uccattaṁ
anya-e0806n2:172_10: guṇaṁ nimittaṁ katvā soyamityabhedasambandha gharesu vattantīti. Palambate ajjhāgacchatityādo
anya-e0806n2:174: Abhimukhaṁ katvātiādinā yogārambhassa phalaṁ dasseti, nāmattheti saddatthe, padatoti āmantaṇādhikaatthamattappakāsakapadato, honti cettha…
anya-e0806n2:179: Taṁ yathā bhava rājeti, nippannattho bhaveti ca.
anya-e0806n2:180_0: Siddhassāti devadattattādinā siddhassa, atthoti devadattādi, kataṁ ābhimukhyaṁ samādhānaṁ
anya-e0806n2:180_1: yenāti viggaho, kriyāyaṁ viniyujjate gaccha bhuñjāti, āmantaṇaṁ natthi… idāni vidhīyamānattenāladdhasattikassābhimukhayitumasakkarūpattā,
anya-e0806n2:182_1: nāme’ccādi, kiriyāya kārakehi ca nipphāditoti iminā sambandhassa kiriyākārakasambandha
anya-e0806n2:182_2: pubbakattamāha, tatoyevāyaṁ nākasmīkoti na yesaṁkesañci dvinnaṁ bhavati, visiṭṭhānaṁyeva
anya-e0806n2:182_3: tu dvinnaṁ bhavatītyatippasaṅgābhāvo, kiriyākārakasambandhapubbako hi kārakehi añño
anya-e0806n2:185_0: Tattha assutāyaṁ kiriyāyaṁ ‘rañño puriso’ccādo kiriyā kārakasambandhapubbako-ñño
anya-e0806n2:185_1: eva sassāmibhāvādiko sambandho patīyateti, ‘sarati rajjassa’tyādo tu suyyamāne kiriyāsadde,
anya-e0806n2:185_2: ettha pana santamapi kammaṁ vattumanicchitaṁ, visesanabhāvoyeva saraṇampati rajjassa
anya-e0806n2:185_3: paṭipādīyate’rajjasambandhisaraṇa’nti, kiriyākāraka sambandho hi sabbattha vatthuṭṭhitivasenevatthi,
anya-e0806n2:185_4: tannimitto ca sassāmi bhāvādi, tattha sassāmibhāvavivacchāyaṁ vijjamānopi kiriyākāraka
anya-e0806n2:185_5: sambandho na vattumicchito, yathā ‘anudarā kaññā’ti, so cāyaṁ sambandho sassāmibhāvajaññajanakabhāvā-vayavāvayavavibhāvādilakkhaṇo
anya-e0806n2:185_6: bahuvidhoti veditabbo, tattha sassāmisambandhe rañño puriso, jaññajanakasambandhe
anya-e0806n2:185_7: nigrodhassa bījaṁ, avayavāvayavisambandhe rukkhassa sākhā, idāni sambandhassetassa
anya-e0806n2:185_9: hi’ccādi, paripālanakiriyākato nesaṁ sambandhoti iminā paripālyaparipālanalakkhaṇo-yaṁ
anya-e0806n2:185_10: sambandhoti dasseti, sā ayampari pālanalakkhaṇā kiriyā sambandhamassedambhāvahetuṁ
anya-e0806n2:185_11: janayitvā nivattati, atthappakaraṇādinā tvimāya kiriyāyāyaṁ sambandhoti viseso vasīyate,
anya-e0806n2:185_12: na chaṭṭhiyā visesāvagamane sāmatthiyaṁ… tassā sabbatthekarūpattā, suyyamāne eva
anya-e0806n2:185_13: vā kiriyāsadde kārakabhāvassa hetuno vacanicchāyābhāve assedambhābhāvasaṅkhātasseva
anya-e0806n2:185_14: phalassa vattumicchitattā tatheva sambandho jāto chaṭṭhiyābhidhīyate ‘rajjassa saratī’ti, vuttaṁ hi–
anya-e0806n2:188_0: Paripālayatīti purisamparipālayati, tato pālanādikā upakāra sabhāvā kiriyādvinnampi
anya-e0806n2:188_1: tesaṁ sambandhinī bhavati, raññā hi kāriyamānā taṁsambandhinīpurisavisayattāvapurisayoginītyubhinnampikiriyāsambhavati,
anya-e0806n2:188_2: tatoyevatassā ubhayasambandhiniyā kiriyāya sambhaveassedanti buddhiyā hetubhūtassa
anya-e0806n2:188_4: sabbathā nirapekkhatte sambandhābhāvā, sambandhi buddhisabbhavassāti sambandhīsu
anya-e0806n2:188_5: rājapurisādīsu assedanti evampavattāya buddhiyā sabbhavassa. Paresaṁ viya “guṇe chaṭṭhī”ti
anya-e0806n2:188_7: ce’ccādi, saccanti yathā vuttaṁ codanamabbhupagamma codakampati yathāvuttaṁ sambandharūpaṁ
anya-e0806n2:188_10: codakādhippāyamatropanetvā tadeva visesato chaṭṭhiyā abhāve samupanetuṁ‘yajjevamihāpi’ccādikamāha,
anya-e0806n2:188_11: tattha athāti codakādhippāyappakāsanārambhe nipāto, evaṁ vattabbanti evaṁ yadipiccādinā
anya-e0806n2:188_13: na parādhīnanti appadhānabhāvato byatiriccate tato-ttaniṭṭhameva, na rūpantarambhajati‘purisasse’ti,
anya-e0806n2:188_15: tato rūpantaraṁ bhajati ‘rañño’ti, tato byatireka lakkhaṇo sambandho hoti, ekassa
anya-e0806n2:188_16: sambandhittāsambhavā vatthuto dviṭṭho visesanagatattena patīyate tato chaṭṭhī visesanamevānudhāvati
anya-e0806n2:188_17: patītivisaye saddappavattī”ti, yo hi vikappanaṁ visayo so saddānanti, atoyeva sambandho
anya-e0806n2:188_18: niyamena visesanabhedamanuvidadhāti… vatthuto dviṭṭhassāpi taggatattena patītiyā
anya-e0806n2:188_19: yathā bhātūnaṁ dhananti, nāvassambhātūnaṁ dhananticceva bhavati, tathā satyapi visessa
anya-e0806n2:188_20: bhede visesanagatameva bhedamanu(vidadhā)ti ‘devadattassa assā’ti, tadetaṁ sabbaṁ
anya-e0806n2:188_23: vatthuto cattuno na virujjhate, vattupaṭibaddhameva ca dviṭṭhattaṁ manasikatvā taṁvādīhi
anya-e0806n2:188_25: dhānappavattitoti, nīlādivisesanantu paratthattenāppadhānampi na kārakabhāvato byatiriccati…
anya-e0806n2:188_27: nīlassuppalassa gandho’ti, yadā tu na visessapavatti tadā byatiriccateva ‘nīlassa
anya-e0806n2:188_28: guṇassa uppalannissayo’ti kārakabhāvalakkhaṇā padhānabhāvā byatiriccate eva nīlādi,
anya-e0806n2:188_29: tato visesanamevānekappakāratāyāva tiṭṭhate, tato vise- sanaṁ kiñcideva kārakarūpato
anya-e0806n2:188_30: padhānabhāvā byatiriccateti visesana mattenāpi sesaṁ sabbaṁ tathā siyāti nāsaṅkanīyanti.
anya-e0806n2:189_0: Dvepīti rājapurisā dvepi, tatiye gehasaṅkhāte sambandhinī. Sahayuttampaṭicca evanti
anya-e0806n2:189_1: iminā purisassa appadhānattameva dīpeti, abhimatāti pāṇiniyānaṁ suttantarena abhimatā,
anya-e0806n2:189_2: yato chaṭṭhīya-mattano mate sambandhanissayā, tenāha- ‘sambandhamevi’ccādi, sambandho
anya-e0806n2:189_3: cettha mātu saraṇānamavaṭṭhānādikiriyānimittoti keci, aññe tu saraṇassa kiriyārūpattā
anya-e0806n2:189_4: kiriyantaramantareneva dabbena sambandhopapattimāhuyathā dvinnaṁ jatukato saṁsileso,
anya-e0806n2:189_5: jatuno tu kaṭṭhenāttanāyeva, na jatvantarakato saṁsilesoti. Paresaṁ tatiyatthe dutiyatthe
anya-e0806n2:189_6: ca kitakappayoge ññatrāpi (pañcamyatthe) sattamyatthe ca (“chaṭṭhī cā”) ti (2-6-20)
anya-e0806n2:189_7: dutiyā pañcamīnañcā”ti (2-6-29) ca suttantarehi chaṭṭhītimatā, tassāpi vatticchātova
anya-e0806n2:189_10: bahulantīmassa atthaṁ dasseti ‘yathā dassana’nti, avisaṁvādakālokassatyādikaṁ kamme
anya-e0806n2:189_11: udāharaṇaṁ, pañcamyatthe pana vatticchātova sabbe tasanti daṇḍassātyādīni udāharaṇāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0806n2:191_1: aññehi tulyatthehi yoge tatiyāya vidhīyamānattā pāṇiniyānaṁ anabhimatā, yasmā sadisā
anya-e0806n2:191_2: bhāvā tesaṁ nopamāti ‘ajjunassa tulā natthī’tyādikamuccate, tasmā evaṁ yathāvuttanayenāti
anya-e0806n2:191_3: tadevantīmassa attho veditabbo, tadevanti vā nipātasamudāyo yathāvuttanidassanattho,
anya-e0806n2:191_4: tulyesūti sadisesu, tathāvuttāti ajjunassatulānatthītyādinā tena pakārena vuttā.
anya-e0806n2:193_0: Sutte ‘ato’ti vuttaṁ ‘akārantato’ti kathaṁ vuttīti āha ‘ato’tiādi, ādesā hontīti
anya-e0806n2:193_1: seso, yakārānaṁyeva siyuṁ… āeādesānamekavaṇṇattā, lope kateti okārassa lope kate,
anya-e0806n2:193_3: kāraṇantaraṁ vattumārabhate ‘kiñcā’tiādi, niccamparalopova siyā, na pubbalopopi āgamappayogānukūlyenātipi
anya-e0806n2:193_4: sakkā vattunti āha-‘nacā’tiādi, niccamparalopoyevāti na ca sakkā mantunti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:193_5: evaṁ santetyādinā tattha virodhamāha, atosambhavāti ādesākārato sambhavā, jhissākāravidhānaṁ
anya-e0806n2:193_8: imassāti “ato yonaṁ ṭāṭe”tī massa suttassa, jhismātvevāti ‘jhismā’ iti etādisaṁ suttameva,
anya-e0806n2:193_9: jhismā yonaṁ ṭāṭetivāti “jhismā yonaṁ ṭāṭe”ti suttaṁ vā, atoti ‘ato’ iti suttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:195: Yasmā ekameva rūpamudāhaṭaṁ, tasmā rūpārūpāni rūperūpānīti bhedo veditabbo, tena hi bahuvacane bahuvacanena (potthake) paṭhamādutiyāsu ‘aṭṭhīnī’ti ekameva rūpamudāhaṭanti dasseti.
anya-e0806n2:197_0: Suñiti ñakāro kimatthoti āha-‘ñakāro’tiādi, asati hi ñakāre‘ñānubandho’ti ñakārena
anya-e0806n2:197_1: visesanena sukāro na visesī yeyya satiyeva tasmiṁ tena so visesīyeyya, tasmā “ñakānubandhādyantā”ti
anya-e0806n2:197_2: sutte ‘ñakānubandhā’ti visesanaṁ visesanabhāvo attho payojanaṁ yassa so visesanattho,
anya-e0806n2:197_5: kathaṁ catutthyattho-vasīyatīti vuccate, catutthīekavacane attattha’nti ettha saddhammasavanādikamattanimittanti
anya-e0806n2:197_6: yo-ttho, so cattho-ñña padatthepi, tassā-ññapadatthabhūtassāpi attā attho payojanambhavati
anya-e0806n2:197_7: nimittabhāvenāti nātthabhedoti ta eta imavajjitānaṁ sabbādīnanti ta etaimasaddehi
anya-e0806n2:197_8: eva vajjitānamaññesaṁ sabbādīnaṁ, paṭisiddhesupi kassaci ādeso dissatīti dassetumāha‘tasaddassa cā’ti.
anya-e0806n2:201: Ghapasaññehīti idaṁ tetimāmūhi tīmassa aññapadatthasamāsena vā visesanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, vuttiyaṁ katanti ādikaṁ kattādippakāsanatthaṁ kataṁ, tāyāti sabbattha vikappodāharaṇaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:203_0: “Āgamā tagguṇībhūtā taggahaṇena gayhantī”ti paribhāsā vacanametaṁ tattha tagguṇībhūtāti
anya-e0806n2:203_1: tasmiṁ āgamimhi guṇībhūtā, avayavavasena pacchā bhavanto amukhyabhūtā, taggahaṇenāti
anya-e0806n2:203_2: āgamiggahaṇena taggahaṇena gahaṇatoti āgamibhūtassa naṁ iccassa gahaṇena gahaṇato,
anya-e0806n2:203_3: ‘namhi vibhattimhi’ti tu vattabbaṁ, vipallāso vā ettha daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0806n2:204_0: (49) Ikārassevavātiādinā vuttameva vivarati tissa iccādinā, tassa tissa, niddiṭṭhattāti
anya-e0806n2:204_1: tissa niddiṭṭhattā, “namhi ticatunnamitthiyaṁ tissa catassā”ti (2-20) tissādeso “namhi
anya-e0806n2:206: Vibhattisutteti “dvedvekānekesvi”(2-1) ccādisutte, ssananti bahuvacanena sahitamekavacanamāha, suttamidanti “suñsassā”ti idaṁ suttaṁ, sutte pana satīti “suña sassā”ti sutte sati.
anya-e0806n2:208: Ratti ca ādi ca ratyādayo, tehi.
anya-e0806n2:212_0: Tenāti yato ltuiti visesanattena vattumicchitassa paccayassa gahaṇaṁ, tenāti attho,
anya-e0806n2:212_1: paccayassa gahaṇā tadādigahaṇaṁ labbhate… “paccayaggahaṇe yato so vihito, tadādino
anya-e0806n2:212_3: (1-13) vacanatoti manasi nidhāyāha- ‘yato’iccādi, so kriyattho ādi yassa so tadādi,
anya-e0806n2:212_4: so paccayo-nto yassa samudāyassa so tadanto, tādisassa tadā ditadantasamudāyavisesa(ssa)
anya-e0806n2:212_5: gahaṇaṁ, na tu tadantamattassetyattho, nanu ca ‘ltvī’ti visesanattena vattumicchite
anya-e0806n2:212_6: bhavatu “vidhibbisesanantassā”ti tadantassa gahaṇaṁ, paccayaggahaṇena pana tadādino
anya-e0806n2:212_7: gahaṇaṁ kathaṁ siyā vacanābhāvātyāha-‘tadavinābhāvittā’ti, yato vihito, tena vinā
anya-e0806n2:212_8: na bhavati sīlenāti tadavinābhāvī, tassa bhāvo tasmā. “Paccayaggahaṇe yato so vihito
anya-e0806n2:212_9: tadādino gahaṇa”nti ñāyassa yattha paccayaggahaṇaṁ tattha sādhāraṇattā ‘tadādino’ti
anya-e0806n2:212_10: vuttaṁ, tadādisamudāyassa gahaṇe panettha viseso na dissati… adhikattāti adhigatantāvāti
anya-e0806n2:212_11: (potthake) ādīsu visesadassanāsambhavā, ‘tuṁsmā lopo cicchāyaṁ te” tyatra (5-4) tu
anya-e0806n2:212_12: dissati viseso, vakkhatihi tattha “tuṁtāyetave bhāve bhavissati kriyāyaṁ tadatthāya”nti
anya-e0806n2:214_0: Aityevavattabbanti ‘gea’ityeva vattabbanti vuttaṁ hoti, pakkhe dīghavidhānenevāti
anya-e0806n2:214_1: iminā akārādese kate pakkhe dīghavidhāneneva, aññatthacaritatthatāyāti ltvantādito
anya-e0806n2:214_2: aññattha bhopurisā bhopurisaiccādo jātipadatthanissayanena katatthatāya, parisa mattatthatāyāti
anya-e0806n2:214_3: vuttaṁ hoti, avassaṁ dīghabhāve kāraṇamāha ‘yadicākāro’iccādi, yadica ākāroti padacchedo.
anya-e0806n2:216_0: Ghaitisaññā ghasaññā tāsaṁ, kaññāsaññātiādīsu ghasaññānaṁ bahuttā bahuvacanena niddeso,
anya-e0806n2:216_1: gharūpassāti ghassāti ghasaddarūpassa, tathā bho brahmāti ettha tathāti iminā brahmātirūpassa
anya-e0806n2:216_2: niruttiyaṁ niddiṭṭhattāva ettha saṅgahitabhāvaṁ dasseti. Evaṁ vivarantīti tasmā sa
anya-e0806n2:216_3: sakhato gassa akāraākārā”tiādinā evaṁ vivaranti, te hi aca āca ica īca ecāti dvande
anya-e0806n2:216_4: pubbasarānaṁ lopaṁ katvā ettupasilesaniddesaṁ vaṇṇenti, sāmaññavidhānanti ‘brahmakattuisi
anya-e0806n2:216_5: sakhato’ccevamavisesetvā sāmaññena kathanaṁ, kimatthanti kiṁ attho payojanaṁ yassa
anya-e0806n2:216_6: taṁ kimatthaṁ. Sāmaññavidhānaṁ kimatthampanevaṁ payojanāsaṅkāyaṁ payojanāsaṅkāvicāraṇaṁ
anya-e0806n2:216_7: manasi nidhāya ‘āgati gaṇoya’nti vuttattā āha– ‘atthato’ccādi, atthatoti sā matthiyato,
anya-e0806n2:216_8: anenāti‘āgatigaṇoya’nti iminā vacanena, idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti ‘āgatigaṇoyanti iminā tadākārasaṅkhātajātippadhānagaṇattappakāsanena
anya-e0806n2:216_9: yadi sambodhane ekārantākārantalābhīnaṁ kattu isi sakha muni bhadantādīnaṁ gahaṇaṁ
anya-e0806n2:216_10: payojanaṁ na siyā, aññathā anupapajjanaṁ siyāti evamaññathānupapattilakkhaṇasāmatthiyato
anya-e0806n2:216_11: sāmaññavidhāne payojanamāhe”ti, soyanti iminā vuttiyaṁ ‘āgati gaṇoya’nti vuttaṁ vacanaṁ nidasseti.
anya-e0806n2:218: Ssañca ssāca ssāyoca añca tiñcāti itarītarayoge cattha samāso,ssaṁ ssā ssāyaṁ tiṁsu.
anya-e0806n2:220_0: Ghoca oca gho ghāntaokārantā, natthi gho yesante agho, tesaṁ, sāmaññavidhānatoti
anya-e0806n2:220_1: kassaci liṅgassa aparāmāsā sāmaññena vidhānato, nādekavacanesūti nādīsu ekavacanesūti
anya-e0806n2:220_2: attho, hi hetumhi, yasmā kassaci evaṁ duṭṭhādhippāyo siyā, tasmā dutiyamudāharaṇanti
anya-e0806n2:220_3: attho, dutiyopi hetumhi, yasmā sabbesaṁ saṅgahaṇatthaṁ, tasmā na ca tathādhippetanti
anya-e0806n2:220_8: “gossā gasihinaṁ sugāvagavā”tyādinā (2-67) karīyamānaṁ gāvādesādikaṁ, ettha pana
anya-e0806n2:220_9: napuṁsake ekavacanantaṁ daṇḍi kulanti vakkhamānattā nodāhaṭaṁ, yosu pana “yolopanisudīgho”ti
anya-e0806n2:220_10: (2-88) adīghassāpi dīghavidhānasāmatthiyā paṭhamameva dīghassa rassābhāvekāva kathāti
anya-e0806n2:220_11: nodāhaṭaṁ, daṇḍīdaṇḍīni icceva tu bhavati, nossavāti pāṭho dissati, ettha vijjamāne
anya-e0806n2:220_12: ge pare okārantassa vā rassāpajjanadosampasaṅgato nossā’ti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:222: Gāvena gavenāti karaṇepi samānaṁ, gāvassa gavassāti chaṭṭhiyāpi.
anya-e0806n2:224: Senāti sutattā seiti vuttiyaṁ nimittaṁ parikappitaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:226: Saddantarattena koci dosoti sambandho, ādisitabbā ādesā kātabbā.
anya-e0806n2:228: Pena pasaññāya yuttā īpī, paca so īcāti vāpī abhedaggahaṇena, aññassāti ikāra ukāraūkārassa.
anya-e0806n2:230: Loke devadatto dattoti ekadesena samudāyavohāra dassanato sminotīmassa smiṁ vacanassātyayamattho dassitotyāha-‘smiti iminā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n2:232_0: Brahmādīsu ‘ito kvaci sassa ṭānubandho’ti pāṭhāti sambandho, brahmādīsūti “ghabrahmādite”ti
anya-e0806n2:232_1: (2-60) sutte vuttabrahmādīsu, pāṭhāti ‘ito’tyādino gaṇasuttassa pāṭhā, ṭānubandhoti
anya-e0806n2:234_0: So bhasmā anto yassa so tadanto samudāyo, tassa, “cānukaḍḍhitaṁ nottaratrānuvattatī”ti
anya-e0806n2:234_1: viññūvacanaṁ, viduno vidūti kūpaccayantassa udāharaṇaṁ, viññuno viññūti “vito ñāto”ti
anya-e0806n2:240: Paṭhamādutiyāyonamekato udāharaṇāni aṭṭhī aṭṭhīniti, tānica yolopanilātisseva dassitāni, tathāyevāññānipi ñāyantīti.
anya-e0806n2:242: Ṭamuttapakkhoti asantaṁ kubbantassāti ṭādesena muttapakkho,ntussacevanti pasiddhattāva ṭādesamuttapakkhaṁ upameti, “sañjātaṁ tārakāditvito”ti (5-45) ito andhitā.
anya-e0806n2:244_0: Ṭādeso-tippasajjatīti kasmā vuttaṁ nanu tadantassa samudāyassa patte “chaṭṭhiyantassā”ti
anya-e0806n2:244_1: (1-17) antasseva hoti, tathāsati nevātippasaṅgo, tasmā kasmātippasajjatīti vuttanti,
anya-e0806n2:244_2: saccaṁ, tathāpi ‘jhissā’ti vattuṁ sakkuṇeyyatte issāti vuttatta vuttanthi sāmatthiyato
anya-e0806n2:244_3: tadantassa ṭādeso-tippasajjatīti tathā vuttanti, nanu ‘jhissā’ti vuttepi sovātippasaṅgo
anya-e0806n2:244_4: tadavatthoyevāti saccaṁ, tathāpi yadi samudāyassa ṭādeso-bhimato siyā ‘tathā sati
anya-e0806n2:244_5: kiṁ jhaggahaṇena issatveva vadeyyāti nātippasajjatīti, jhaggahaṇe nāmante ikārasseva
anya-e0806n2:244_6: jhasaññattāti idaṁ pana visesanattena vattu manicchite yujjati.
anya-e0806n2:248_0: Hetukurusaddehi yosu iminā ṭādese “lopo”tīminā yolope vā sampatte “paccayanissitaṁ
anya-e0806n2:248_2: balavā”ti paṭhamaṁ ṭādese nimittābhāvāva lopā bhāvoti dassetumāha-‘hetukurusaddehi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:250_0: Nanu katarādayova sabbādisaddavacanīyā honti samāsenābhihitattā, na tu sabbasaddo
anya-e0806n2:250_1: saddasse (potthake) tyāha-‘avayavene’tyādi,yadipi ‘sabba saddo ādi yesa’nti avayavena
anya-e0806n2:250_2: viggaho, tathāpi samudāyovāssattho bhavati… yesantyanena samudāyassa parāmāsāti bhāvo,
anya-e0806n2:250_3: itīti hetumhi, ko bhavantānaṁ dvinnaṁ bahunnaṁ vā eko deva datto kaṭhādīhi vā atthe
anya-e0806n2:250_4: dvīhi bahūhi vā ekassa niddhāraṇe sati kimhā niddhāraṇe ratara ratamesu ṇādivuttiyaṁ
anya-e0806n2:250_6: kiṁsaddassa rūpasiddhīti dassetumāha katamā’tiādi, ubho aṁsā assāti atthe “ayubhadvitīhaṁse”ti
anya-e0806n2:250_7: (4-49) aye“saro lopo sare”ti (1-26) saralope rūpasiddhīti āha-‘ubho aṁsā’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:250_8: kāyaṁ vavatthā nāme tyāha-‘sābhidheyyā’tyādi, avadhiccādinā tassevātthaṁ vibhāveti,
anya-e0806n2:250_9: adhaṁso abhaṭṭhatā avadhibhāveyevāvaṭṭhānaṁ, sābhidheyyā pekkhāti ettha so sako abhidheyyo
anya-e0806n2:250_10: attho disādi sābhidheyyoti gahitoti āha-‘pubbādīna’ntiādi, sābhidheyyanti kammato
anya-e0806n2:250_13: ettha ca parādisaddābhidheyyo-ttho disādesādi pubbādisaddābhidheyyassātthassa disāya
anya-e0806n2:250_14: desādino vāvadhibhāvena niyamavasena pavattati, yo cāvadhibhāvo niyamavasena pavattati,
anya-e0806n2:250_15: socāvadhibhāvo niyamavasena pavatto pubbādisaddavacanīyaṁ disādesādi mapekkhatīti
anya-e0806n2:250_16: sābhidheyyāpekkhovadhiniyamoyeva vavatthāti vuccatītyayamadhippāyo, na tu abhidheyyāyanti
anya-e0806n2:250_17: asambhavā, asambhavameva dassento āha-‘yo hi’ccādi, kosallena nimittenāti kusala
anya-e0806n2:250_18: saddassa pavattinimittena kosallena, uttarākuravo uttarakurudīpa vāsino, deso vā,
anya-e0806n2:250_19: ‘nāññañca nāmappadhānā”ti (2-136) aneneva saññāyaṁ sabbādikāriyassa nisiddhatte kimasaññāyaṁbhyanenetyāha
anya-e0806n2:252_1: yuttatā cāssa pāṭhe byabhicāra dassanatoti vattumāha-‘napuṁsake’ccādi, pāṭhānugatā
anya-e0806n2:252_2: hi suttaracanā, vikappānuvattiyā anapuṁsakamidameva vacanaṁ tassa kvaci byabhicāratte
anya-e0806n2:252_3: ñāpakanti vattumāha-‘tassa cā’tiādi, avassamevamettha attho gahetabbo, aññathā yathāvaṭṭhitapāṭhānukkamenātthaggahaṇe
anya-e0806n2:252_4: sati suttassa suttassā (potthake) mukhyattappatītito kathantamaññassa ñāpakaṁ bhaveyya,
anya-e0806n2:254_0: Nanu ca “lakkhaṇapaṭipadavuttesu paṭipadavuttasseva gahaṇa”ntīmāya paribhāsāya lakkhaṇikassākārassa
anya-e0806n2:254_1: gahaṇaṁ na pappotītyāsaṅkiya paṭipādayamāha-‘rassākāre’ccādi, paribhāsāya cassāyamattho
anya-e0806n2:254_2: “lakkhīyateneneti lakkhaṇaṁ, sādhvasādhujānana hesuttā sutta sattha muccate, paṭigatampadaṁ
anya-e0806n2:254_3: paṭipadaṁ, uccāritamañjasetyattho, lakkhaṇañca paṭipadañca lakkhaṇapaṭipadāni, tehi
anya-e0806n2:254_4: vuttāni rūpāni lakkhaṇapaṭipadavuttāni, tesu, vuttasaddo paccekamparisamāpīyate ‘lakkhaṇavuttesu
anya-e0806n2:254_5: paṭipadavuttesū’ti, tatrāñcasā yamaniddiṭṭhaṁ, kevalaṁ lakkhaṇadassanenāsmiṁ lakkhaṇe
anya-e0806n2:254_6: satyavassamanena rūpena bhavitabbanti lakkhaṇena paṭipāditaṁ, taṁ lakkhaṇavuttamityuccate,
anya-e0806n2:254_7: yantvañjasā saddeneva paṭipāditaṁ, taṁ paṭipadavuttanti vuccate, tasmiṁ lakkhaṇavutte
anya-e0806n2:254_8: paṭipadavutte ca rūpe sati paṭipadavuttasseva gahaṇaṁ, netarasse”ti, paṭipadavuttassevetyavadhāraṇena
anya-e0806n2:254_9: niyamarūpabhāssā paribhāsāyāvagamyate, so ca niyamo aniyamapubbake sandehe satyavatiṭṭhate,
anya-e0806n2:254_10: tasmā yatra lakkhaṇavuttameva kevalaṁ, na paṭipadavuttaṁ, tatra nāyaṁ paribhāsā vatiṭṭhate,
anya-e0806n2:254_11: yatrāpi paṭipadavuttameva kevalaṁ, na lakkhaṇavuttaṁ, sopyetissā avisayo, yatra dve
anya-e0806n2:254_12: rūpāni sambhavanti tatrevā yamparibhāsā sandehāpākaraṇamukhena pavattāti ñāyappattoyevā
anya-e0806n2:254_13: mattho imāya paribhāsāyānuvādyate, tathāhi sandehaṭhānesu yadyapyekarūpamevamabhinnamubhinnaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:254_14: tathāpi lakkhaṇavuttaṁ rūpaṁ lakkhaṇe nonnīyamānaṁ dhūmaggi viya jalabalākā viya
anya-e0806n2:254_15: cānu mānikaṁ, yantu paṭipada vuttaṁ rūpaṁ, taṁ paccakkhasiddhaṁ, paccakkhānumānesu
anya-e0806n2:254_16: ca paccakkhambalavantaraṁ pamāṇanti ato paṭipadavuttameva gayhatīti.
anya-e0806n2:258_3: ante saddo sattamyatthe, aṅge bhavamantaraṅgaṁ vibhatthyatthe-saṅkhyasamāso “eonama
anya-e0806n2:258_4: vaṇṇe”ti (1-37) attaṁ rāgamo, aṅgato bahi bahiraṅgaṁ “payyapābahitiro purepacchā
anya-e0806n2:258_5: vā pañcamyā”ti (3-5) asaṅkhyasamāso, atra cāntaraṅgaṁ bahiraṅganti nāṅgebhavamantaraṅgaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:258_6: apitvantaraṅganissitaṁ kāriyamantaraṅgaṁ, nāpyaṅgato bahibhūto samudāyo bahiraṅgaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:258_7: kintu bahiraṅganissitaṁ kāriyambahiraṅgaṁ yathā mañcanissitesu saddāyantesu ‘mañcā
anya-e0806n2:258_8: saddāyantī’tyuccate taṁ viyeti atoyevā saṅkhyasamāsepi liṅgavibhattivacanantarayogo
anya-e0806n2:258_11: kate paccakkha ñāṇassākkhanissitattañāpanatthaṁ saṅketavasena kato-yamasaṅkhya samāso,
anya-e0806n2:258_14: liṅgavibhattivacanantarayogo na virujjhate, athavā antaramaṅgamassa kāriyassātthīti
anya-e0806n2:258_16: tesvantaraṅgo balavāti. Antaraṅga kāriyassa balavattaṁ sādhetuṁ ‘sabbapaṭhamaṁ vidheyyattā’tiādi
anya-e0806n2:258_17: vuttaṁ, idampana antaraṅgakāriyassa balavabhāvasādhane kāraṇaṁ na hoti, antaraṅgattā
anya-e0806n2:258_18: balavabhāvoyeva hi sabbapaṭhamaṁ vidheyyatta kāraṇaṁ, tathā cāha-‘yo lopato akārassa
anya-e0806n2:258_19: paṭhamameva bhavane kāraṇamāha antaraṅgattā akārassā’ti, tasmā nāyaṁ pāṭho ghaṭate,
anya-e0806n2:258_20: antaraṅgabalavabhāvasādhanassa pana lokato icchitattā ayamevatthe pāṭho ghaṭate”antaraṅgameva
anya-e0806n2:258_21: kāriyambalavaṁ loke tathādiṭṭhattā, tathā hi loko pātovā”tyādi, loke tathādiṭṭhattāti
anya-e0806n2:258_22: antaraṅgabalavabhāvassa loke evaṁ vakkhamānanayena diṭṭhattā, athavā kenaci vidhurappaccayopanipātena
anya-e0806n2:258_23: kāraṇave kallena vā kadāci kattumasakkuṇeyyattepi antaraṅgassa avassaṁ vidheyyattaṁ
anya-e0806n2:258_24: dassetumāha sabbapaṭhamaṁ vidheyyattā’ti, satisambhaveti nimittassānupahatattā kāriyassa sambhave sati.
anya-e0806n2:260: Ivaṇṇassāti vuttattāti ‘ye passivaṇṇassā”ti ettha ivaṇṇassāti vuttattā.
anya-e0806n2:262_1: asatī saṅkhyā yesantyānyasaṅkhyānītyāha- ‘ekatte’ccādi, ekānekesūti vuttattā saṅkhyāvisese
anya-e0806n2:262_3: syādīnaṁ sambhavo’ti. Atha nissaṅkhyehi hotusyādīnamasambhavo uccaṁ rukkhassiccādotu
anya-e0806n2:262_5: vivarati ‘aññathe’ tyādinā, kimesamuppattiyampayojanaṁ yenāsaṅkhyehi taduppatti no-numīyate
anya-e0806n2:262_7: natthīti yo ādīsu padasmā paresaṁ tumhāmhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ vonoādikaṁ padanimittaṁ
anya-e0806n2:262_8: kāriyaṁ na siyāti ‘uccaṁ vo, uccaṁ no’tiādayo payogā na sijjhanti, sati tu syāduppattiyaṁ
anya-e0806n2:262_9: luttesupi tesu padattanipphattiyāyeva taduppattito padatte siddhe padalakkhaṇaṁ kāriyaṁ
anya-e0806n2:262_10: sijjhatevāti bhāvo. Parehi ettha ‘tassaṁ sālāya’nti vacanicchāyaṁ ‘tatra sālāya’nti
anya-e0806n2:262_12: lopo vihito, tenāha- ‘asaṅkhyehi’ccādi, tadayuttanti āppaccayassa lopavidhāna mayuttaṁtyattho.
anya-e0806n2:262_13: Atha kenātra āppaccayo vidhīyate yenāssāpi lopo-nusāsīyate “itthiyamatvā”ti (3-26)
anya-e0806n2:262_14: ce netadatthi, itthiyamāppaccayassa vidhānato-saṅkhyānañcāliṅgattā, tasmā asaṅkhyehi
anya-e0806n2:262_16: itthiyanti (3-26) hi guṇippadhāno niddeso itthattavati āppaccayādayo vidhīyante ‘tassaṁ
anya-e0806n2:262_17: sālāya (micce tasmiṁ padatthe) tatre’ti asaṅkhyamidamitthattavati vattate, tasmā
anya-e0806n2:262_18: siyāye vetasmā āppaccayotyavassamāppaccayassa lopo vidheyyoti yo maññate, tampati
anya-e0806n2:262_20: vattate’ti cobhayamikkhate, itthiyanti niddesassa guṇippadhānattaṁ sādhetuṁ ‘itthattavati
anya-e0806n2:262_21: hi āppaccayādayo’tiāha, tatretīmassāsaṅkhyassa sālāyaṁ vattanato āha- ‘itthattavati
anya-e0806n2:262_22: cā’ti, ayampasiddhirūpena na vattateti sambandho, yadi ayampasiddhirūpena vattate,
anya-e0806n2:262_25: tassāti itthattassa, padattho ca itthattaṁ siyāti yopyāheti sambandho, gammamānatthattā
anya-e0806n2:262_26: itisaddāppayogo, tassāyuttanti tassevaṁ vādino jinindabuddhino vacanamayuttaṁtyattho,
anya-e0806n2:262_27: kutoccāha- ‘evaṁ hi’ccādi, yadi itthattassa vākyatthatā itthippaccayanivattikatā,
anya-e0806n2:262_28: evaṁ sati sālāyamiccādisaddantarāpekkhā itthattappatīti tatretyādīsu siyāti attho,
anya-e0806n2:262_29: neva tathā patīyatīti bhāvo, vuttamevatthaṁ phuṭayitumāha- ‘tathāhi’ccādi, aviddasuayanti
anya-e0806n2:262_30: diṭṭhanto paññāso, aviddasu ayanti ubhayatrāpyatrekavacanasissa nivattiyā kataṁ yamekattaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:262_31: taṁ saddantarādyanapekkhameva patīyatetyattho, itthatta vuttinā sālādisaddena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ
anya-e0806n2:262_32: tatretyetassāti etāvatā āppaccayo uppajjatīti ca na sakkā vattunti dassento āha-‘samānādhikaraṇattampi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:262_33: samānādhikaraṇattampīti (itthi) vuttinā sālādisaddena sāmānādhikaraṇyampi, āppaccayādīnaṁ nāṅganti sambandho.
anya-e0806n2:264_0: Evāti anuvattateeva, ekottho yassa pakatyādisamudāyassa so ekattho ‘assa cekatthasaddassa
anya-e0806n2:264_2: vattanaṁ vutti īyādīnaṁ vutti, īyādividhāne satityattho, samāsatoti samāsitā, tenevāti
anya-e0806n2:266_0: Yadā cātrādhisaddappayogo tadā teneva vibhatyatthassa vuttattā na sattamī payujjate,
anya-e0806n2:266_1: yadā sattamī, na tadādhisaddo, tenā sakapadeneva viggaho evaṁ dassanīyoti āha- ‘itthīsu
anya-e0806n2:268_0: So ca amādeso, ādesassevāti aṁādesasseva, apañcamiyāti pañcamiṁ vajjetvā. Aññatra
anya-e0806n2:268_1: vidhīyamāno-yamamādeso pañcamiyampaṭisiddhattā pañcamiyā paṭisedhena sayampi paṭisiddho
anya-e0806n2:268_4: na lopa paṭisedhenāti paribhāsamāha-‘anantarassa vidhi vā hoti paṭisedho vā’ti, ettha
anya-e0806n2:268_6: antarāḷamattapaṭisedhe payojanaṁ natthītyantarāḷagatassa vidhino paṭisedhassa cābhāvānantarotyupa
anya-e0806n2:268_7: carīyate anantarā gāmātyādi viya, diṭṭhatte pana majjhassa na vijjate-ntara mesanti
anya-e0806n2:268_9: tenevānantarassāti paribhāsāyameka vacanaṁ, itisaddo idamatthe, iti imāya paribhāsāyādesenābhisambandhatītyattho,
anya-e0806n2:268_10: tenāti yathāvuttaparibhāsāya vasena, yena kāraṇenādesenābhisambandhati tenātyattho,
anya-e0806n2:268_11: alopoti lopa paṭisedho, sāmatthiyāladdhanti dvinnamatthānaṁ vidhānāya dve vākyāni
anya-e0806n2:268_13: tatrāpañcamiyātyādesenevāti sambandhati, vuttavidhānā na lopapaṭisedhena, tathāsatyamapañcamiyātidaṁ
anya-e0806n2:268_14: vākyaṁ yadi na visesatthamālambate tamantarenānupapattito-ññathā kintyanenātthabalena
anya-e0806n2:268_15: laddhanti attho, alopoti jotetīti sambandho, vākyabhedena vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ, na ekavākyattenāti
anya-e0806n2:268_16: byatireko ekavākyatāyañhi kāriya dvayassapi pañcamiyampaṭisedho siyā ‘pañcamiṁ vajjetvā
anya-e0806n2:268_17: taṁ kāriyadvayaṁ veditabba’nti, yadipi siddhāti sambandho, yena nāppattiyātyanena
anya-e0806n2:268_19: kimatthamihāyaṁ paribhāsā paṭhyate iha satthe-pavādā ussagge bādhanteti niyamo, tatra
anya-e0806n2:268_20: cussaggā duvidhā niyatappattayo aniyatappattayo ceti, ye sabbatthāpavādavisayampavisanti,
anya-e0806n2:268_21: te niyatappattayo vuccante, ye kvacidevāpavādavisayamavagāhante, te aniyatappattayo
anya-e0806n2:268_22: vuccante, evaṁ duvidhesussaggesu ye-niyatappattayo, tesameva bādhanamicchīyate, na
anya-e0806n2:268_23: niyatikānaṁ, tena tappadassanatthamayamparibhāsā paṭhyateti, yenetyussaggassa niddeso,
anya-e0806n2:268_24: neti paṭisedhavācī nipāto, appatte asamphuṭṭhe visaye ityajjhāhāriyaṁ, yena ussaggena
anya-e0806n2:268_25: nāppatte patteeva samphuṭṭheeva visayetyattho… ‘dve paṭisedhā pākatamatthaṁ gamentī’ti
anya-e0806n2:268_26: katvā, vidhīyatīti, paṭisedho vidhānañca, ārabbhate vidhī
anya-e0806n2:269_1: yena tvappatte visaye ārabbhate tassa bādhanaṁ na bhavatītyattho, kutoti ce anavakāsattā,
anya-e0806n2:269_2: tathāhi yadi ussaggena sabbo visayo gahito siyā, ko-pavādassaañño visayo siyā, tasmā
anya-e0806n2:269_3: anavakāsattā (na) apa (vāde) pana tassa bādhanambhavatītyavaseyaṁ, yena tussaggena
anya-e0806n2:269_4: koci devāpavādavisayo-nuppattosiyā, nasabbo, tampati sāvakā sattā tambādhateti vuttaṁ
anya-e0806n2:271_0: Sutte anitthiyanti kimatthiya (manena) paṭisedhavacanena, yato imassetvevānitthiliṅgena
anya-e0806n2:271_2: paribhāsāyaṁ, tattha liṅgena sutte niddiṭṭhato aññena kenaci visiṭṭhaṁ nāmaṁ liṅgavisiṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:271_3: tassa, yattha saddasāmaññasannissayanaṁ, tattha nāmaggahaṇe satiliṅgavisiṭṭhassāpi
anya-e0806n2:271_4: gahaṇaṁ hoti… sāmaññe sabbavisesānuppave satotyadhippāyo, idamevāti anitthiyanti
anya-e0806n2:271_5: vacanameva, ñāpakanti patti pubbako paṭisedho, so itthiyampattiyaṁ sati anitthiyanti
anya-e0806n2:271_6: kato siyāti anitthiyanti paṭisedhavacanamevemaṁ paribhāsaṁ ñāpetīti attho, iminā
anya-e0806n2:273: Anapuṁsakassāti pariyudāsoti anapuṁsakassāti ettha nañsaddassa pariyudāso-tthotyattho.
anya-e0806n2:277_0: Hotu sito-ññatrake sati sādeso, simhi tu kappaccayā paṭhamameva kato massa sādesoti
anya-e0806n2:277_1: tappaccaye sati ‘kevā’ti kiṁ sāmaññena sādesavidhānene tyāsaṅkiya suttassa sāmañña
anya-e0806n2:277_4: vibhattiyā padattasādhikāyāpagamena padattābhāvā, padasaṅkhāranibandhanoti pada siddhi
anya-e0806n2:277_6: nimittassa abhāvo nimittābhāvo, tasmiṁ nimittābhāve hetuvināsetyattho, nimittā āgato
anya-e0806n2:277_7: nemittiko, phalabhūto dhammo, nimitte bhāvo vā nemittiko, nimittassābhāve taṁ hetuto
anya-e0806n2:277_8: pavattassa nemittikassa phalassāpyabhāvo bhavatī”ti, tathāhi chattanimittachāyā chattāpāyena
anya-e0806n2:277_9: bhavati, padīpanimittadassanaṁ padīpāpāye na bhāti, tathehāpi nimittato pavattānaṁ
anya-e0806n2:277_10: nimittābhāve abhāvoyeva yutti māti maññate, aññatracāti sito aññatra ca.
anya-e0806n2:281_0: Imissāyātyādīsu “ssaṁ ssā ssāye”tyādinā (2-52) i, “tadādesā te viya hontī”ti paribhāsato
anya-e0806n2:281_1: sādyādesīnaṁ gahaṇāssāyādesādīnaṁ gahaṇasambhavepi kiṁ ssāyādiggahaṇe na suttagurukaraṇene
anya-e0806n2:281_2: tyāsaṅkiya‘ssāyādiggahaṇa’miccādi, vutti gantho vuttoti dassetumāha-‘nanu ce’tyādi,
anya-e0806n2:282: Desino ādeso tadādeso, tassa, tassa ādesino gahaṇaṁ taggahaṇaṁ, tena.
anya-e0806n2:284_0: Aññathāti guruniddesamakatvā aññena lahuppakārena niddisane sati, ekavibhattiniddiṭṭhattāti‘dutiyāyossā’ti
anya-e0806n2:284_2: paribhāsekadesassa adhippāyo pakāsitoti ñātabbaṁ, etadevānuvattatītyanena tu “ekayoga
anya-e0806n2:284_4: yojanā paribhāsāyaṁ, ñāpetīti pubbe viya sāmatthiyena ñāpeti.
anya-e0806n2:286_0: Appadhānappaṭisedhato sabbādīnaṁ tadantavidhinā bhavitabbaṁ, aññathā hi sabbādiggahaṇe
anya-e0806n2:286_1: ko pasaṅgo piyasabbādīnaṁ, yato appadhānappaṭisedho, karīyate tena paramasabbeiccādi
anya-e0806n2:288_0: Yatthāti yasmiṁ kattari karaṇe vā, kattari tatiyāsiddhimāha-‘karoti’ccādi, karotimhi
anya-e0806n2:288_1: karadhātumhi gammamāne, māsena katāti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ… māsena katānaṁ pubbānanti
anya-e0806n2:288_2: vattabbattā, pubbabhāveti pubbabhavane māsassa karaṇattaṁ, ettha tu māsena karaṇabhūtena
anya-e0806n2:288_3: pubbabhūtānanti attho, tenevetthāpi bhavantīti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:290: Cassa attho cattho, soyevāti ettha samāsassa parāmāso, cattho ettha sambhavati kintu sabbādi na catthasamāsavisayoti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:292_0: Kiṁ bahulaṁvidhānā ‘vuddhyabhāvo’ otthābhāvo (pañcikāyaṁ) ti pāṭhena payojanaṁ yene
anya-e0806n2:292_1: tadatthameva “sumedhādīnamavuddhi ce”ti gaṇapāṭho kato, hemasaddena hemamayāni gahitānyabhedenatyāha-
anya-e0806n2:292_2: ‘hemamayānī’ti, kappana saddena sīsālaṅkārajālāni gayhanti, tāniyeva vāsasāni paṭā
anya-e0806n2:292_3: taṁsarikkhatāya, sakatthepi yathāgamambhavantīti sambandho, bāṇādīsu abhidheyyesu
anya-e0806n2:292_4: manādīsu na paṭṭhīyantīti yojanā, bāṇādīsuti bāṇa saddakkhayādīsu, ahasaddassa manādikāriyāsambhavā
anya-e0806n2:292_5: ahasaddo manādīsu na daṭṭhabbo, rahasīti nipātattā ikārassa ca asabbhavā rahasaddo
anya-e0806n2:292_6: ca manādīsu na daṭṭhabboti sajjhāhāro sambandho veditabbo, ikārassa kaccāyane smino
anya-e0806n2:292_7: karīyamānassa ikārādesassa ca, rahatisaddassa nipātattaṁ sabhāvato pakāsetuṁ ‘rahasītyādi’māha,
anya-e0806n2:292_8: rahosaddeti ettha rahasaddoti pāṭho-vagantabbo, tenāti yena ahasaddassa manādikāriyāsambhavo
anya-e0806n2:294: Geti gasaññe pare, kuto-nuiccādo bho’iti bahuvacananto nipāto, tathāsati ‘tayojanā’ti yujjati, tañca nipātattaṁ samatthetīti nipātamatteti dassetumāha- ‘bahutte’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:296_0: Sattamyantaṁ bhavatīti seso, nanucantassāti vutte ntantuppaccayovāvasīyati, na tadantavidhīti
anya-e0806n2:296_1: ntantuppaccayova nāvasīyati, tadantavidhipīti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ āha- ‘ntappaccaya
anya-e0806n2:296_2: sseve’ccādi, sutattāti sotaviññāṇena gahitattā paccakkhattāti vuttaṁ hoti, anumitassa
anya-e0806n2:298: Daḷho dhammo dhanu assa daḷhadhammā. Rājādīsvimappaccaye paṭhite
anya-e0806n2:299: Tadanto paccayaggahaṇa paribhāsāya gayhatī tyāha- ‘iminā iccādi.
anya-e0806n2:301_0: Paccayaiccādinā “paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito tadādino tadantassa ca gahaṇa”nti
anya-e0806n2:301_1: ñāyaṁ dasseti, tattha yato vihito taṁ vinā na bhavati paccayotyanena ñāyena pattoyevāttho
anya-e0806n2:301_2: ākhyāyate ‘paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito, tadādino gahaṇa’nti, “vidhibbisesanantasse”ti
anya-e0806n2:301_3: tadantaggahaṇaṁtyākhyāyate ‘tadantassa ca gahaṇa’nti, so pakativiseso ādi yassa samudāyassa
anya-e0806n2:301_4: so tadādi, so paccayo-nte yassa samudāyassa so tadanto, tādisassa tadāditadantasamudāyavisesassa
anya-e0806n2:301_5: gahaṇaṁ, na tu tadantamattassetyattho, iha tu tadantaggahaṇamevānurūpanti’ dassetumāha-“kattari
anya-e0806n2:301_6: ltuṇakā”ti iminā tyādi, tadāditadanta samudāyassa tu gahaṇe phalaṁ ‘byajigisī’tiādīsu
anya-e0806n2:301_7: daṭṭhabbaṁ, tañca “tuṁsmā lopocicchāyaṁ te”ti (5-4) sutte sayameva vakkhati.
anya-e0806n2:303_2: ‘sakamandhātu’ saddopi ltvantoti sajjhāhāro padasambandho daṭṭhabbo, tatopīti na
anya-e0806n2:303_3: kevalaṁ kattutova, mandhātusaddassa ltvantataṁ sādhetvā sakamandhātusaddampaṭipādetuṁ
anya-e0806n2:305_0: Saṅkhyāsaddo yadīpi saṅkhyāne vattate, tathāpi saṅkhyānadvārenidhasaṅkhyeyye vattatītyāha-‘cuddasahi
anya-e0806n2:305_1: saṅkhyāhī’ti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ, cuddasasaddavacanīyāva pañcādisaṅkhyā, yato saṅkhyāsaddo neha pariggahitoti.
anya-e0806n2:309: Dutiyāggahaṇenāti ‘dutiyāyossa ne vā’tyevaṁ sutta racanāyaṁ dutiyāggahaṇena.
anya-e0806n2:313_1: itthipumannapuṁsaka samūhoti etthāyantesaṁ sādhanakkamo ‘dvandachaṭṭhīhi samāse itthipumanapuṁsakasamūho’ti
anya-e0806n2:313_2: ṭhite “samāse ca vibhāsā”ti (2-2-35) pumantassa amādese “vaggantaṁ vā vagge”ti (1-42)
anya-e0806n2:315: Kammādittā enassāpi abhāvapakkheti “nā sse no”ti (2-80) kammādito nāssa enādesakaraṇato vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:317_1: kathitānukathanaṁ, anena ca neha pacchā uccāraṇamattamanvādeso, kiñcarahi ekassābhidheyyassa
anya-e0806n2:317_2: pubbasaddena paṭipāditassa dutiyampatipādanamanvādesoti vadati, teneha na bhavati
anya-e0806n2:317_3: ‘devadattaṁ bhojaya, imañca yaññadatta’nti, kenaci visesantarayogena kathitassānukathanaṁ
anya-e0806n2:317_4: anvādesoti sambandho. Kathampana visesantarayogo gamyateccāha- ‘sāmatthiyā’ti, kenaci
anya-e0806n2:319: Navirujjhatīti iminā “itthiyamatvā”ti (3-26) sāmaññena vidhānato syādyantamajjhepi itthiyampaccayo navirujjhatīti vadati.
anya-e0806n2:321_0: Nanu yathākkamaṁ naṁvibhattikkamenāpi sambhavati, tathāsati ‘dvinnaṁ saddānaṁ dveādesā
anya-e0806n2:321_1: kamene’cceva kasmā vuttaṁ tyāsaṅkiyāha ‘na naṁvibhattikkamenāpī’ti. Kāraṇamāha- ‘tassānapekkhitattā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:321_2: iminā nissayakaraṇamekā satthiyā yuttīti dasseti, apekkhite kathaṁ bhaveyyā tyāha-
anya-e0806n2:321_3: ‘yadi hi’ccādi, apekkhiti yathākkamaṁ, evamaññate “kiñcāpi jātiniddesena dvepi naṁ
anya-e0806n2:321_4: rūpāni gayhanti, tathāpi ‘ticatunna’nti viya byattiniddesova yathākkamopakārīyamānāna,
anya-e0806n2:321_5: manudesassa tathā viññayamānattāti naṁsuicceva vadeyya, na tathā vuttaṁ, tato-vasīyate
anya-e0806n2:323_0: Nanu ntantūnanti tadantā gayhanti paccayaggahaṇaparibhāsāya, tathā sati kāriyittena
anya-e0806n2:323_1: tadantāva gayhanti kathaṁ ntantūyevā tyāsaṅkiyāha- teyeve’ccādi, paccakkhatāyāti
anya-e0806n2:323_2: sutathāya-pañcikā sutattā, balavattā teyeva kāriyittena gayhantīti sambandho, na
anya-e0806n2:323_3: tadantā, dubbalāti byatirekaṁ vatvā dubbalatte kāraṇamāha- ‘anumitattā’ti, anumitattaṁ
anya-e0806n2:323_4: sādhetumāha- ‘anumitāhi’ccādi, bhavibhattīnanti pāṭho yutta taro, tassa antādese akāreti sambandho.
anya-e0806n2:325_1: tenevāha pañcikāyaṁ- ‘kathamidamavasīyate yomhīti niddesā’ti, tassadāni atthampakāsetuṁ
anya-e0806n2:325_2: ‘paccekanti ekekasmi’ntiādi vuttaṁ. Ekekasmiṁ yomhi dvinnaṁ ādesānaṁ sambhavā ādesīnampi
anya-e0806n2:325_3: bahuttasambhavoti sutte ‘dvinna’nti bahuvacananiddeso, vuttiyampana paccekaṁ yomhi
anya-e0806n2:325_4: paccekaṁ dvisaddasambhavā ‘dvissā’ti vuttaṁ, dutiyāyampi duve dve.
anya-e0806n2:327: Pakatavasenāti tumhāmhānamādesānamadhikatavasena, kamamanatikkamma na bhavantīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n2:329_0: Kaccāyanācariyo tumhāmhehi parāya catutthī chaṭṭhī savibhattiyā “sassaṁ”ti (2-3-3)
anya-e0806n2:329_1: suttena amādesaṁ vidhāya ‘tumhaṁ amha’nti bahuvacanarūpāni sādheti… ekasmimpi attani
anya-e0806n2:329_2: guruādike ca gārava vasena bahuvacanarūpadassanatoti dassetumāha-tumhaṁ amha’ntiādi,
anya-e0806n2:329_3: tassāyuttattā ‘tamayutta’nti vatvā ayuttataṁ sādheti ‘evaṁ hi’ccādinā, imasmimpana
anya-e0806n2:329_4: satthe ekasmimpi sabbathā bahuvacana rūpasādhanakkamaṁ dassetuṁ ‘idha panā’tiādimāraddhaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:331_0: Nenāti nakārena, padasaññāvidhāya kavacanābhāvepīti pāṇini yānamiva syādityādyantānaṁ
anya-e0806n2:331_1: padasaññāvidhāyakassa suttassa abhāvepi, anvatthavasena padanti gayhamāne atippasaṅgopi
anya-e0806n2:331_2: siyāti āha-‘ruḷhiyāvātippasaṅgā bhāvo’ti, ākhyātaṁ sābyayakāraka visesanaṁ vākyanti
anya-e0806n2:331_3: keci, ekākhyātikaṁ vākyantyapare, taṁ sabbaṁ ekato saṅgahetvā ‘padasamūho vākya’nti
anya-e0806n2:331_4: vuttikārena vuttanti dassetumāha- ‘sābyaye’ccādi, ākhyātaṁ tyādyantamāhu, abyayamasaṅkhyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:331_5: ākhyātaṁ sābyayaṁ sakārakaṁ savisesanañca vākyesaññaṁ bhavatītyattho, visesananti
anya-e0806n2:331_6: kārakavisesanassa kiriyā visesanassa ca sāmaññena gahaṇaṁ, sābyayaṁ-saddhiṁ vacati,
anya-e0806n2:331_7: sakārakaṁ odanaṁ pacati devadatto pacati, sakārakavisesanaṁ-muduṁ visadamodanampacati,
anya-e0806n2:331_8: dassanīyo devadatto pacati, sakiriyāvisesanaṁ- muduṁ pacati, mandaṁ pacati, padasamūho
anya-e0806n2:331_9: vākyanti vutte ayampi adhippāyavisesovasīyatīti vattumāha-vattu’miccādi, yatheccādinā
anya-e0806n2:331_10: anekākhyāti kampi guṇappadhānabhāve nopakārato vākyamekambhavati… pada samūho vākyanti
anya-e0806n2:331_11: vuttattāti vadati, yathā vākyanānattanti sambandho. Ihāpīti vattumicchitatthetyādopi.
anya-e0806n2:333_0: Higgahaṇe pañcamīhissāpi gahaṇambhaveyyāti sutte ‘apañcamyā’ti vuttaṁ, tumhehi puññaṁ
anya-e0806n2:333_1: pasutaṁ anappakanti gāthāpāde tumhehitiādisū tattā na voādeso, tumhe tiṭṭhatha nagareti
anya-e0806n2:333_2: pubbavākyato vākyantarattā ekavākyatā natthi, tumhe viya diya dissanti amhe viya
anya-e0806n2:335: Pacchā ādeso anvādesoti gahite kathitānukathananti kathaṁ ñāyatīti āha- ‘pacchā kathanañca kathitāpekkhanti katvā’ti.
anya-e0806n2:337: Saha vijjamāno pubbo yassa so sapubbo.
anya-e0806n2:341_0: Jaṭā assa atthīti jaṭilo, sova jaṭilako, jaṭilakāti ekatthe nidassitavisesavacanaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:341_1: māṇavakāti viya na sāmaññavacanaṁ, asatte sampatteti idaṁ “āmantaṇaṁ pubbamasantaṁ
anya-e0806n2:341_2: vā”ti (2-239) suttassa sāmaññatā vuttaṁ, sāmaññavacanassa paṭisedhoti iminā visesavacane
anya-e0806n2:341_4: devadatto devadattasaddo ādi yassa, tañca taṁ sāmaññavacanañca, tasmiṁ devadattādisāmaññavacane
anya-e0806n2:341_5: māṇavake māṇavakasadde parabhūte sati, ubhinnampi asatteti iminā idaṁ dīpeti “devadattāti
anya-e0806n2:341_6: visesavacanattā paṭisedhābhāvā pubbaparānamubhinnampi “āmantaṇaṁ pubbamasantaṁ vā”tīdaṁ pappotī”ti.
